anya-e0903n:11_0: Pucchā – paṭhamamahāsaṃgītikāle āvuso dhammasaṃgāhakā mahākassapādayo mahātheravarā
anya-e0903n:11_1: porāṇasaṃgītikārā paṭhamaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ saṃgāyitvā tadanantaraṃ suttantapiṭakaṃ
anya-e0903n:11_2: saṃgāyantā dīghanikāyañca majjhimanikāyañca saṃgāyitvā tadanantaraṃ kiṃnāma pāvacanaṃ saṃgāyiṃsu.
anya-e0903n:12_0: Vissajjanā – paṭhamamahāsaṃgītikāle bhante dhammasaṃgāhakā mahākassapādayo porāṇatheravarā
anya-e0903n:12_1: paṭhamaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ saṃgāyitvā tadanantaraṃ suttantapiṭakaṃ saṃgāyantā dīghanikāyañca
anya-e0903n:12_2: majjhimanikāyañca saṃgāyitvā tadanantaraṃ sattahi ca suttasahassehi sattahi ca suttasatehi
anya-e0903n:12_3: dvāsaṭṭhiyā ca suttehi paṭimaṇḍitaṃ bhāṇavārasataparimāṇaṃ saṃyuttanikāyaṃ nāma pāvacanaṃ saṃgāyiṃsu.
anya-e0903n:13: Pucchā – saṃyuttanikāye ca āvuso sagāthāvaggo nidānavaggo khandhavaggo saḷāyatanavaggo mahāvaggoti pañcasaṃyuttappakaraṇāni, tesu paṭhamaṃ kataraṃ saṃyuttappakaraṇaṃ te saṃgāyiṃsu.
anya-e0903n:14: Vissajjanā – pañcasu bhante saṃyuttappakaraṇesu paṭhamaṃ sagāthāvaggasaṃyuttappakaraṇaṃ saṃgāyiṃsu.
anya-e0903n:15: Pucchā – sagāthāvaggepi āvuso devatāsaṃyuttādivasena ekādasasaṃyuttāni, tesu paṭhamaṃ kataraṃ saṃyuttaṃ te saṃgāyiṃsu.
anya-e0903n:16: Vissajjanā – ekādasasu bhante saṃyuttesu paṭhamaṃ devatāsaṃyuttaṃ saṃgāyiṃsu.
anya-e0903n:17: Pucchā – devatāsaṃyuttepi āvuso naḷavaggādayo aṭṭha vaggā, oghataraṇasuttādīni ca ekāsīti suttāni, tesu paṭhamaṃ kataraṃ vaggaṃ katarañca suttaṃ sagāyiṃsu.
anya-e0903n:18: Vissajjanā – aṭṭhasu bhante vaggesu paṭhamaṃ naḷavaggaṃ ekāsītiyā ca suttesu paṭhamaṃ oghataraṇasuttaṃ saṃgāyiṃsu.
anya-e0903n:19: Sādhu sādhu āvuso, mayampi dāni tatoyeva paṭṭhāya saṃgītipubbaṅgamāni pucchanavissajjanakiccāni āvahituṃ samārabhāra.
anya-e0903n:22: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena oghataraṇasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:23_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ devataṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ, aññatarā bhante
anya-e0903n:23_1: devatā abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇā kevalakappaṃ jetavanaṃ obhāsetvā yena
anya-e0903n:23_2: bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi, ekamantaṃ
anya-e0903n:23_3: ṭhitā kho sā devatā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “kathaṃ nu tvaṃ mārisa oghamatarī”ti,
anya-e0903n:24: Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “apatiṭṭhaṃ khvāhaṃ āvuso anāyūhaṃ oghamatariṃ”ti, evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:26: Pucchā – accentisuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:27: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ devataṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Aññatarā bhante devatā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca–
anya-e0903n:39: Pucchā – sattisuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:40: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ devataṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ, aññatarā bhante devatā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca–
anya-e0903n:52: Pucchā – jaṭāsuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:53: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ devataṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ, aññatarā bhante devatā bhavagantaṃ etadavoca–
anya-e0903n:55: Taṃ taṃ gotama pucchāmi, ko imaṃ vijaṭaye jaṭa”nti–
anya-e0903n:57: Sīle patiṭṭhāya naro sapañño, cittaṃ paññañca bhāvayaṃ;
anya-e0903n:58: Ātāpī nipako bhikkhu, so imaṃ vijaṭaye jaṭaṃ.
anya-e0903n:59: Yesaṃ rāgo ca doso ca, avijjā ca virājitā;
anya-e0903n:62: Sīle patiṭṭhāya naro sapañño, cittaṃ paññañca bhāvayaṃ;
anya-e0903n:63: Ātāpī nipako bhikkhu, so imaṃ vijaṭaye jaṭaṃ–
anya-e0903n:64: Yesaṃ rāgo ca doso ca, avijjā ca virājitā;
anya-e0903n:67: Paṭighaṃ rūpasaññā ca, etthesā chijjate jaṭā.
anya-e0903n:69: Pucchā – accharāsuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:70: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ devaputtaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Aññataro bhante devaputto bhagavantaṃ etadavoca–
anya-e0903n:72: Vanantaṃ mohanaṃ nāma, kathaṃ yātrā bhavissatī”ti.
anya-e0903n:74: “Ujuko nāma so maggo, abhayā nāma sā disā,
anya-e0903n:78: Yassa etādisaṃ yānaṃ, itthiyā purisassa vā;
anya-e0903n:79: Sa ve etena yānena, nibbānasseva santike”ti.
anya-e0903n:82: Vanantaṃ mohanaṃ nāma, kathaṃ yātrā bhavissati–
anya-e0903n:84: Pucchā – jarāsuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:85: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ devataṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Aññatarā bhante devatā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca–
anya-e0903n:86: “Kiṃ su yāva jarā sādhu, kiṃ su sādhu patiṭṭhitaṃ;
anya-e0903n:87: Kiṃ su narānaṃ ratanaṃ, kiṃ su corehi dūhara”nti.
anya-e0903n:89: “Sīlaṃ yāva jarā sādhu, saddhā sādhu patiṭṭhitā;
anya-e0903n:90: Paññā narānaṃ ratanaṃ, puññaṃ corehi dūhara”nti.
anya-e0903n:98_0: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena subrahmasuttaṃ
anya-e0903n:98_1: kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ katañca bhāsitaṃ. Kīdiso ca tattha dhammapaṭiggāhakassa
anya-e0903n:99: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante subrahmadevaputtaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Subrahmā bhante devaputto maraṇabhayabhīto bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca–
anya-e0903n:102: Sace atthi anutrastaṃ, taṃ me akkhāhi pucchito”ti–
anya-e0903n:106_0: Evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ. Desanāpariyosāne ca bhante subrahmassa devaputtassa
anya-e0903n:106_1: tasmiṃyeva āsane virajaṃ vītamalaṃ dhammacakkhuṃ udapādi, “yaṃkiñci samudayadhammaṃ,
anya-e0903n:107: Niccaṃ utrastamidaṃ cittaṃ, niccaṃ ubbiggamidaṃ mano;
anya-e0903n:109: Sace atthi anutrasta, taṃ me akkhāhi pucchito-hu–
anya-e0903n:113: Pucchā – rohitassasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:114_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante rohitassaṃ devaputtaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Rohitasso
anya-e0903n:114_1: bhante devaputto bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “yattha nu kho bhante na jāyati na jīyati
anya-e0903n:114_2: na mīyati na cavati na upapajjati, sakkā nu kho so bhante gamanena lokassa anto ñātuṃ
anya-e0903n:114_3: vā daṭṭhuṃ vā pāpuṇituṃ vā”ti. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “yattha kho āvuso na jāyati
anya-e0903n:114_4: na jīyati na mīyati na cavati na upapajjati, nāhaṃ taṃ gamanena lokassa antaṃ ñāteyyaṃ
anya-e0903n:114_5: aṭṭheyyaṃ patteyyanti vadāmī”ti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:117: Pucchā – daharasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:118_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante rājānaṃ pasenadiṃ kosalaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Rājā
anya-e0903n:118_1: bhante pasenadi kosalo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavatā saddhiṃ
anya-e0903n:118_2: sammodi, ekamantaṃ nisinno kho bhante rājā pasenadi kosalo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca
anya-e0903n:118_3: “bhavampi no gotamo ‘anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho’ti paṭijānātī”ti. Tasmiṃ
anya-e0903n:118_4: bhante vatthusmiṃ “yañhi taṃ mahārāja sammā vadamānovadeyya ‘anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ
anya-e0903n:118_5: abhisambuddho’ti, mameva taṃ sammā vadamāno vadeyyā”ti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:119: Tasmā hi paṇḍito poso, sampassaṃ atthamattano;
anya-e0903n:123: Pucchā – attarakkhitasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:124_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante rājānaṃyeva pasenadiṃ kosalaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Rājā
anya-e0903n:124_1: bhante pasenadi kosalo bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā “idha mayhaṃ bhante rahogatassa
anya-e0903n:124_2: paṭisallīnassa evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādī”ti evamādikaṃ vacanaṃ avoca. Bhagavā
anya-e0903n:124_3: ca bhante evametaṃ mahārāja evametaṃ mahārājāti evamādinā vibhajitvā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:125: Kāyena saṃvaro sādhu, sādhu vācāya saṃvaro;
anya-e0903n:126: Manasā saṃvaro sādhu, sādhu, sabbattha saṃvaro;
anya-e0903n:129: Pucchā – appakasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:130_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante rājānaṃyeva pasenadiṃ kosalaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Rājā
anya-e0903n:130_1: bhante pasenadi kosalo bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā “idha mayhaṃ bhante rahogatassa
anya-e0903n:130_2: paṭisallīnassa evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi appakā te sattā lokasmiṃ, ye uḷāre
anya-e0903n:130_3: uḷāre bhoge labhitvā na ceva majjanti na ca pamajjanti, na ca kāmesu gedhaṃ āpajjantī”ti
anya-e0903n:130_4: evamādikaṃ vacanaṃ avoca. Bhagavā ca bhante “evametaṃ mahārāja evametaṃ mahārājā”ti
anya-e0903n:132: Pucchā – mallikāsuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:133_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante rājānaṃyeva pasenadiṃ kosalaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Rājā
anya-e0903n:133_1: bhante pasenadi kosalo mallikaṃ deviṃ etadavoca “atthi nu kho te mallike kocañño
anya-e0903n:133_2: attanā piyataro”ti. Tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ sabbādisā anuparigamma cetasāti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:134: Sabbā disā anuparigamma cetasā, nevajjhagā piyataramattanā kvaci. Evaṃ piyo puthu attā paresaṃ, tasmā na hiṃse paramattakāmo–
anya-e0903n:136: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena sattajaṭilasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:137_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante rājānaṃ pasenadiṃ kosalaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Rājā
anya-e0903n:137_1: bhante pasenadi kosalo acirapakkantesu sattasu ca jaṭilesu sattasu ca nigaṇṭhesu
anya-e0903n:137_2: sattasu ca acelakesu sattasu ca ekasāṭakesu sattasu ca paribbājakesu yena bhagavā
anya-e0903n:137_3: tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi, ekamantaṃ
anya-e0903n:137_4: nisinno kho bhante rājā pasenadi kosalo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “ye te bhante loke
anya-e0903n:137_5: arahanto vā arahattamaggaṃ vā samāpannā, ete tesaṃ aññatarā”ti. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ
anya-e0903n:137_6: “dujjānaṃ kho etaṃ mahārāja tayā gihinā kāmabhoginā puttasambādhasayanaṃ ajjhāvasantena
anya-e0903n:137_7: kāsiṇacandanaṃ paccanubhontena mālāgandhavilepanaṃ dhārayantena jātarūparajataṃ sādiyantena
anya-e0903n:137_8: “ime vā arahanto, ime vā arahattamaggaṃ samāpannā”ti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:138: Na vaṇṇarūpena naro sujāno, na vissase ittaradassanena;
anya-e0903n:141: Caranti loke parivārachannā, anto asuddhā bahisobhamānā-hū
anya-e0903n:143: Pucchā – pañcarājasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:144_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante rājānaṃyeva pasenadiṃ kosalaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Rājā
anya-e0903n:144_1: bhante pasenadi kosalo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “kiṃ nu kho bhante kāmānaṃ agga”nti.
anya-e0903n:144_2: Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “manāpapariyantaṃ khvāhaṃ mahārāja pañcasu kāmaguṇesu agganti
anya-e0903n:145: Idha bhante amhākaṃ pañcannaṃ rājūnaṃ pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samappitānaṃ samaṅgībhūtānaṃ paricārayamānānaṃ ayamantarākathā udapādiṃ ‘kiṃ nu kho kāmānaṃ agga’nti–
anya-e0903n:146: Padumaṃ yathā kokanadaṃ sugandhaṃ, pāto siyā phullamavītagandhaṃ. Aṅgīrasaṃ passa virocamānaṃ, tapantamādiccamivantalikkhe–
anya-e0903n:148: Pucchā – dutiyaaputtakasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:149_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante rājānaṃyeva pasenadiṃ kosalaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Rājā
anya-e0903n:149_1: bhante pasenadi kosalo bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā “idha bhante sāvatthiyaṃ seṭṭhi
anya-e0903n:149_2: gahapati kālaṅkato, tamahaṃ aputtakaṃ sāpateyyaṃ rājantepuraṃ atiharitvā āgacchāmī”ti
anya-e0903n:149_3: evamādikaṃ vacanaṃ avoca. Bhagavā ca bhante “evametaṃ mahārāja, evametaṃ mahārāja,
anya-e0903n:149_4: bhūtapubbaṃ so mahārāja seṭṭhi gahapati taggarasikhiṃ nāma paccekasambuddhaṃ piṇḍapātena
anya-e0903n:149_5: paṭipādesī”ti evamādinā tassa seṭṭhissa gahapatissa atītaṃ vatthuṃ āharitvā pariyosāne
anya-e0903n:150: Dhaññaṃ dhanaṃ rajataṃ jātarūpaṃ, pariggahaṃ vāpi yadatthi kiñci,
anya-e0903n:151: Dāsā kammakarā pessā, ye cassa anujīvino.
anya-e0903n:154: Tañhi tassa sakaṃ hoti, taṃva ādāya gacchati;
anya-e0903n:160: Pucchā – tapokammasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā jinena kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:161: Vissajjanā – uruvelāyaṃ bhante māraṃ pāpimantaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Māro bhante pāpimā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā gāthāya ajjhabhāsi.
anya-e0903n:167: Sīlaṃ samādhi paññañca, maggaṃ bodhāya bhāvayaṃ;
anya-e0903n:168: Pattosmi paramaṃ suddhiṃ, nihato tvamasi antakā”ti.
anya-e0903n:169: Evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā jinena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:170: Tapokammā apakkamma, ye na sujjhanti māṇavā;
anya-e0903n:175: Pucchā – hatthirājavaṇṇasuttaṃ panāvuso bhavagatā jinena kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:176_0: Vissajjanā – uruvelāyaṃ bhante mārakaṃyeva pāpimantaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Māro bhante
anya-e0903n:176_1: pāpimā bhagavato bhayaṃ chambhitattaṃ lomahaṃsaṃ uppādetukāmo mahantaṃ hatthirājavaṇṇaṃ
anya-e0903n:179: Alaṃ te tena pāpima, nihato tvamasi antakā”ti.
anya-e0903n:180: Evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā jinena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:182: Alaṃ te tena pāpima, nihato tvamasi antaka –
anya-e0903n:185: Pucchā – idāni āvuso bhikkhunī saṃyuttaṃ pucchāmi, yaṃ tassa bhagavato arahato sammāsambuddhassa sāvikāhi therīhi attano
anya-e0903n:186_0: Ca buddhasāsanassa ca yathābhūtaṃ guṇaṃ pakāsetvā bhāsitaṃ. Tatthāvuso paṭhamaṃ porāṇakehi
anya-e0903n:186_1: mahākassapādīhi dhammasaṃgāhakehi theravarehi saṃgītaṃ āḷavikāsuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha
anya-e0903n:187_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante māraṃ pāpimantaṃ ārabbha āḷavikāya bhikkhuniyā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:187_1: Māro bhante pāpimā āḷavikāya bhikkhuniyā bhayaṃ chambhitattaṃ lomahaṃsaṃ uppādetukāmo
anya-e0903n:187_2: vivekamhā cāvetukāmo āḷavikaṃ bhikkhuniṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi–
anya-e0903n:192: Pamattabandhu pāpima, na tvaṃ jānāsi taṃ padaṃ;
anya-e0903n:194: Yaṃ tvaṃ kāmaratiṃ brūsi, arahi mayha sā ahū”ti.
anya-e0903n:195: Evaṃ kho bhante āḷavikāya bhikkhuniyā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:196: Natthi nissaraṇaṃ loke, kiṃ vivekena kāhasi;
anya-e0903n:198: Atthi nissaraṇaṃ loke, paññāya me suphussitaṃ;
anya-e0903n:199: Pamattabandhu pāpima, na tvaṃ jānāsi taṃ padaṃ.
anya-e0903n:201: Yaṃ tvaṃ kāmaratiṃ brūsi, arati mayha sā ahu–
anya-e0903n:203: Pucchā – somāsuttaṃ panāvuso kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kena kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:204_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃyeva bhante andhavane māraṃ pāpimantaṃ ārabbha somāya bhikkhuniyā
anya-e0903n:204_1: bhāsitaṃ. Māro bhante pāpimā somāya bhikkhuniyā bhayaṃ chambhitattaṃ lomahaṃsaṃ uppādetukāmo
anya-e0903n:204_2: samādhimhā cāvetukāmo somaṃ bhikkhuniṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi.
anya-e0903n:210: Yassa nūna siyā evaṃ, itthāhaṃ purisoti vā;
anya-e0903n:211: Kiñci vā pana aññasmi, taṃ māro vattumarahatī”ti.
anya-e0903n:212: Evaṃ kho bhante somāya bhikkhuniyā ariyasāvikāya bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:213: Yaṃ taṃ isīhi pattabbaṃ, ṭhānaṃ durabhisambhavaṃ;
anya-e0903n:215: Itthi bhāvo kiṃ kayirā, cittamhi susamāhite;
anya-e0903n:216: Ñāṇamhi vatta mānamhi, sammā dhammaṃ vipassato.
anya-e0903n:217: Yassa nūna siyā evaṃ, itthāhaṃ purisoti vā;
anya-e0903n:218: Kiñci vā pana aññasmi, taṃ māro vattumarahati.
anya-e0903n:220: Pucchā – tatthāvuso kisāgotamīsuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kena kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:221_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃyeva bhante andhavane māraṃ pāpimantaṃ ārabbha kisāgotamiyā
anya-e0903n:221_1: bhikkhuniyā theriyā bhāsitaṃ. Māro bhante pāpimā kisāgotamiyā bhikkhuniyā bhayaṃ
anya-e0903n:221_2: chambhitattaṃ lomahaṃsaṃ uppādetukāmo samādhimhā cāvetukāmo kisāgotamiṃ bhikkhuniṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi–
anya-e0903n:226: Na socāmi na rodāmi, na taṃ bhāyāmi āvuso.
anya-e0903n:229: Evaṃ kho bhante kisāgotamiyā bhikkhuniyā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:230: Kiṃ nu tvaṃ mataputtāva, ekamāsi rudammukhī;
anya-e0903n:233: Na socāmi na rodāmi, na taṃ bhāyāmi āvuso.
anya-e0903n:237: Pucchā – tatthāvuso porāṇehi saṃgītikāramahātheravarehi saṃgītaṃ uppalavaṇṇasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kena kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:238_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃyeva bhante andhavane māraṃ pāpimantaṃ ārabbha uppalavaṇṇāya
anya-e0903n:238_1: bhikkhuniyā bhāsitaṃ. Māro bhante pāpimā uppalavaṇṇāya bhikkhuniyā bhayaṃ chambhitattaṃ
anya-e0903n:238_2: lomahaṃsaṃ uppādetukāmo samādhimhā cāvetukāmo uppalavaṇṇaṃ bhikkhuniṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi–
anya-e0903n:239: “Supupphitaggaṃ upagamma bhikkhuni, ekā tuvaṃ tiṭṭhasi sālamūle. Na catthi te dutiyā vaṇṇadhātu, bāle na tvaṃ bhāyasi dhuttakāna”nti.
anya-e0903n:245: Esā antaradhāyāmi, kucchiṃ vā pavisāmi te;
anya-e0903n:249: Evaṃ kho bhante uppalavaṇṇāya bhikkhuniyā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:251: Pucchā – tatthāvuso cālāsuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kena kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:252_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante andhavane māraṃyeva pāpimantaṃ ārabbha cālāya bhikkhuniyā
anya-e0903n:252_1: ariyasāvikāya bhāsitaṃ. Māro bhante pāpimā cālaṃ bhikkhuniṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca
anya-e0903n:252_2: “kiṃ nu tvaṃ bhikkhuni na rocesī”ti. Jātiṃ khvāhaṃ āvuso na rocemī”ti.
anya-e0903n:253: Kiṃ nu jātiṃ na rocesi, jāto kāmāni bhuñjati;
anya-e0903n:254: Ko nu taṃ idamādapayi, jātiṃ mā roca bhikkhunīti.
anya-e0903n:256: Jātassa maraṇaṃ hoti, jāto dukkhāni phussati;
anya-e0903n:257: Bandhaṃ vadhaṃ pariklesaṃ, tasmā jātiṃ na rocaye.
anya-e0903n:260: Ye ca rūpūpagā sattā, ye ca arūpaṭṭhāyino;
anya-e0903n:262: Evaṃ kho bhante cālāya bhikkhuniyā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:263: Kiṃ nu jātiṃ na rocesi, jāto kāmāni bhuñjati;
anya-e0903n:264: Ko nu taṃ idamādapayi, jātiṃ mā roca bhikkhunī.
anya-e0903n:265: Jātassa maraṇaṃ hoti, jāto dukkhāni phussati;
anya-e0903n:266: Bandhaṃ vadhaṃ pariklesaṃ, tasmā jātiṃ na rocaye.
anya-e0903n:270: Pucchā – tatthāvuso selāsuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kena kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:271_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante māraṃyeva pāpimantaṃ ārabbbha selāya bhikkhuniyā
anya-e0903n:271_1: ariyasāvikāya bhāsitaṃ. Māro bhante pāpimā selāya bhikkhuniyā bhayaṃ chambhitattaṃ
anya-e0903n:271_2: lomahaṃsaṃ uppādetukāmo samādhimhā cāvetukāmo selaṃ bhikkhuniṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi–
anya-e0903n:272: Kenidaṃ pakataṃ bimbaṃ, kvanu bimbassa kārako;
anya-e0903n:273: Kvanu bimbaṃ samuppannaṃ, kvanu bimbaṃ nirujjhatīti.
anya-e0903n:275: Nayidaṃ attakataṃ bimbaṃ, nayidaṃ parakataṃ aghaṃ;
anya-e0903n:278: Kenidaṃ pakataṃ bimbaṃ, kvanu bimbassa kārako;
anya-e0903n:279: Kvanu bimbaṃ samuppannaṃ, kvanu bimbaṃ nirujjhati-hu–
anya-e0903n:280: Nayidaṃ attakataṃ bimbaṃ, nayidaṃ parakataṃ aghaṃ;
anya-e0903n:283: Pucchā – tatthāvuso porāṇakehi mahākassapādīhi dhammasaṃgāhakatheravarehi saṃgītaṃ vajirāsuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kena kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:284: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante māraṃ pāpimantaṃ ārabbha vajirāya theriyā bhikkhuniyā bhāsitaṃ. Māro bhante pāpimā purimanayeneva vajiraṃ bhikkhuniṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi–
anya-e0903n:285: Kenāyaṃ pakato satto, kuvaṃ sattassa kārako,
anya-e0903n:286: Kuvaṃ satto samuppanno, kuvaṃ satto nirujjhatīti.
anya-e0903n:288: Kiṃ nu sattoti paccesi, māradiṭṭhigataṃ nu te;
anya-e0903n:290: Yathā hi aṅgasambhārā, hoti saddo ratho iti;
anya-e0903n:291: Evaṃ khandhesu santesu, hoti sattoti sammuti.
anya-e0903n:292: Dukkhameva hi sambhoti, dukkhaṃ tiṭṭhati veti ca,
anya-e0903n:293: Nāññatra dukkhā sambhoti, nāññaṃ dukkhā nirujjhatīti.
anya-e0903n:294: Evaṃ kho bhante vajirāya bhikkhuniyā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:296: Kuvaṃ satto samuppanno, kuvaṃ satto nirujjhati-hu–
anya-e0903n:297: Kiṃ nu sattoti paccesi, māra diṭṭhigataṃ nu te;
anya-e0903n:301: Pucchā – brahmasaṃyutte āvuso porāṇehi mahākassapatherādīhi dhammasaṃgāhakatheravarehi dutiyaṃ saṃgītaṃ gāravasuttaṃ kattha kathañca samuppannaṃ.
anya-e0903n:302_0: Vissajjanā – uruvelāyaṃ bhante samuppannaṃ. Bhagavā bhante uruvelāyaṃ viharati najjā
anya-e0903n:302_1: nerañjarāya tīre ajapālanigrodhamūle paṭhamābhisambuddho. Atha kho bhagavato rahogatassa
anya-e0903n:302_2: paṭisallīnassa evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi “dukkhaṃ kho agāravo viharati appatisso,
anya-e0903n:302_3: kaṃ nu khvāhaṃ samaṇaṃ vā brāhmaṇaṃ vā sakkatvā garuṃ katvā upanissāya vihareyya”nti.
anya-e0903n:303_0: Atha kho bhante bhagavato etadahosi “aparipuṇṇassa kho sīlakkhandhassa pāripūriyā
anya-e0903n:303_1: aññaṃ samaṇaṃ vā brāhmaṇaṃ vā sakkatvā garuṃ katvā upanissāya vihareyyuṃ, na kho
anya-e0903n:303_2: panāhaṃ passāmi sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya
anya-e0903n:304: Brāhmaṇaṃ vā, yamahaṃ sakkatvā garuṃ katvā upanissāya vihareyyuṃ.
anya-e0903n:308_0: Aparipuṇṇassa kho vimuttiñāṇadassanakkhandhassa pāripūriyā aññaṃ samaṇaṃ vā brāhmaṇaṃ
anya-e0903n:308_1: vā sakkatvā garuṃ katvā upaninissāya vihareyyaṃ. Na kho panāhaṃ passāmi sadevake
anya-e0903n:308_2: loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya attanā vimuttiñāṇadassanasampannataraṃ
anya-e0903n:308_3: aññaṃ samaṇaṃ vā brāhmaṇaṃ vā, yamahaṃ sakkatvā garuṃ katvā upanissāya vihareyyaṃ.
anya-e0903n:308_4: Yaṃnūnāhaṃ yvāyaṃ dhammo mayā abhisambuddho, tameva dhammaṃ sakkatvā garuṃ katvā
anya-e0903n:308_5: upanissāya vihareyya”nti. Evaṃ kho bhante bhagavato cetaso parivitakkavasena uppannaṃ.
anya-e0903n:309: Ye ca atītā sambuddhā, ye ca buddhā anāgatā;
anya-e0903n:316: Pucchā- tatthāvuso porāṇakehi mahākassapādīhi dhammasaṃgāhakatheravarehi paṭhamaṃ saṃgītaṃ aññatarabrahmasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kena kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:317_0: Vissajjanā – brahmaloke bhante aññataraṃ brahmānaṃ ārabbha āyasmatā mahāmoggallānattherena
anya-e0903n:317_1: bhāsitaṃ. Aññatarassa bhante brahmuno evarūpaṃ pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ uppannaṃ hoti
anya-e0903n:317_2: “natthi so samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā, yo idha āgaccheyyā”ti. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ–
anya-e0903n:318: Ajjāpi te āvuso sā diṭṭhi, yā te diṭṭhi pure ahu;
anya-e0903n:320: Evaṃ kho bhante āyasmatā mahāmoggallānattherena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:321: Ajjāpi te āvuso sā diṭṭhi, yā te diṭṭhi pure ahu;
anya-e0903n:323: Na me mārisa sā diṭṭhi, yā me diṭṭhi pure ahu;
anya-e0903n:325: Svāhaṃ ajja kathaṃ vajjaṃ, ahaṃ niccomhi sassato hu–
anya-e0903n:329: Pucchā – tatthāvuso aruṇavatīsuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:330_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “bhūtapubbaṃ bhikkhave
anya-e0903n:330_1: rājā ahosi aruṇavā nāma. Rañño kho pana bhikkhave aruṇavato aruṇavatī nāma rājadhānī
anya-e0903n:330_2: ahosī”ti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā aruṇavatī suttaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:337: Pucchā – brāhmaṇasaṃyutte āvuso paṭhamaṃ saṃgītaṃ dhanañjānīsuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:338: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante bhāradvājagottaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Bhāradvājagotto bhante brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā gāthāya ajjhabhāsi.
anya-e0903n:351: Kiṃ su chetvā sukhaṃseti, kiṃ su chetvā na socati;
anya-e0903n:353: Pucchā – imañca panāvuso dhammadesanaṃ sutvā bhāradvājagotto brāhmaṇo imasmiṃ dhammavinaye pasanno kīdisaṃ pasannākāramakāsi, kīvattakañca atthaṃ sampādesi.
anya-e0903n:354_0: Vissajjanā – imañca pana bhante dhammadesanaṃ sutvā bhāradvājagotto brāhmaṇo “abhikkantaṃ
anya-e0903n:354_1: bho gotama, abhikkantaṃ bho gotama, seyyathāpi bho gotama nikkujjitaṃ vā ukkujjeyya,
anya-e0903n:354_2: paṭicchannaṃ vā vivareyya, mūḷhassa vā maggaṃ ācikkheyya, andhakāre vā telapajjotaṃ
anya-e0903n:354_3: dhāreyya cakkhumanto rūpāni dakkhantī”ti evamādinā bhante imasmiṃ dhammavinaye pasanno
anya-e0903n:354_4: pasannākāramakāsi. Imañca pana bhante dhammadesanaṃ sutvā bhāradvājagotto brāhmaṇo
anya-e0903n:354_5: bhagavato santike pabbajjaṃ upasampadaṃ yācitvā acirūpasampanno yāva arahattaṃ sampādesi.
anya-e0903n:356: Pucchā – akkosakabhāradvājasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:357_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante akkosakabhāradvājaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Akkosakabhāradvājo
anya-e0903n:357_1: bhante brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā asabbhāhi pharusāhi vācāhi bhagavantaṃ
anya-e0903n:357_2: akkosati paribhāsati. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “taṃ kiṃ maññasi brāhmaṇa, api nukho
anya-e0903n:357_3: te āgacchanti mittāmaccā ñātisālohitā atitiyo”ti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:374: Pucchā – imañca panāvuso dhammadesanaṃ sutvā akkosakabhāradvājo brāhmaṇo imasmiṃ dhammavinaye pasanno kīdisaṃ pasannākāramakāsi. Kīvattakañca atthaṃ sampādesi.
anya-e0903n:375_0: Vissajjanā – imañca pana bhante dhammadesanaṃ sutvā akkosakabhāradvājo brāhmaṇo “abhikkantaṃ
anya-e0903n:375_1: bho gotama, abhikkantaṃ bho gotamā”ti evamādinā imasmiṃ dhammavinaye pasanno pasannākāramakāsi.
anya-e0903n:375_2: Yāva arahattā ca pana mahantaṃ atthaṃ sampādesi.
anya-e0903n:377: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā jānatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena brāhmaṇasaṃyutte bahudhītarasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:378_0: Vissajjanā – kosalesu bhante aññatarasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe aññataraṃ bhāradvājagottaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ
anya-e0903n:378_1: ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Aññataro bhante bhāradvājagotto brāhmaṇo goṇe naṭṭhe pariyesanto
anya-e0903n:380: Ajjasaṭṭhiṃ na dissanti, tenāyaṃ samaṇo sukhī;
anya-e0903n:381: Na hi nūnimassa samaṇassa, tilākhettasmi pāpakā;
anya-e0903n:382: Ekapaṇṇā dupaṇṇā ca, tenāyaṃ samaṇo sukhī.
anya-e0903n:384: Na hi nūnimassa samaṇassa, paccūsamhi iṇāyikā;
anya-e0903n:385: Detha dethāti codenti, tenāyaṃ samaṇo sukhī”ti.
anya-e0903n:387: Na hi mayhaṃ brāhmaṇa, balībaddā catuddasa;
anya-e0903n:388: Ajjasaṭṭhiṃ na dissanti, tenāhaṃ brāhmaṇā sukhī;
anya-e0903n:389: Na hi mayhaṃ brāhmaṇa, tilākhettasmi pāpakā;
anya-e0903n:390: Ekapaṇṇā dupaṇṇā ca, tenāhaṃ brāhmaṇā sukhī.
anya-e0903n:392: Na hi mayhaṃ brāhmaṇa, paccūsamhi iṇāyikā;
anya-e0903n:393: Detha dethāti codenti, tenāhaṃ brāhmaṇā sukhīti.
anya-e0903n:396: Na hi nūnimassa samaṇassa, balībaddā catuddasa;
anya-e0903n:397: Ajjasaṭṭhiṃ na dissanti, tenāhaṃ samaṇo sukhī.
anya-e0903n:399: Na hi nūnimassa samaṇassa, tilākhettasmi pāpakā;
anya-e0903n:400: Ekapaṇṇā dupaṇṇā ca, tenāyaṃ samaṇo sukhī.
anya-e0903n:402: Na hi nūnimassa samaṇassa, tucchakoṭṭhasmi mūsikā;
anya-e0903n:405: Na hi nūnimassa samaṇassa, santhāro sattamāsiko;
anya-e0903n:408: Na hi nūnimassa samaṇassa, vidhavā satta dhītaro;
anya-e0903n:409: Ekaputtā duputtā ca, tenāyaṃ samaṇo sukhī.
anya-e0903n:411: Na hi nūnimassa samaṇassa, piṅgalā tilakāhatā;
anya-e0903n:412: Sottaṃ pādena bodheti, tenāyaṃ samaṇo sukhī.
anya-e0903n:414: Na hi nūnimassa samaṇassa, paccūsami iṇāyikā;
anya-e0903n:415: Detha dethāti codenti, tenāyaṃ samaṇo sukhī.
anya-e0903n:417: Na hi mayhaṃ brāhmaṇa, balībaddā catuddasa;
anya-e0903n:418: Ajjasaṭṭhiṃ na dissanti, tenāhaṃ brāhmaṇā sukhī.
anya-e0903n:420: Na hi mayhaṃ brāhmaṇa, tilākhettasmi pāpakā;
anya-e0903n:421: Ekapaṇṇā dupaṇṇā ca, tenāhaṃ brāhmaṇā sukhī.
anya-e0903n:423: Na hi mayhaṃ brāhmaṇa, tucchakoṭṭhasmi mūsikā;
anya-e0903n:426: Na hi mayhaṃ brāhmaṇa, santhāro sattamāsiko;
anya-e0903n:429: Na hi mayhaṃ brāhmaṇa, vidhavā satta dhītaro;
anya-e0903n:430: Ekaputtā duputtā ca, tenāhaṃ brāhmaṇā sukhī.
anya-e0903n:432: Na hi mayhaṃ brāhmaṇa, piṅgalā tilakāhatā;
anya-e0903n:433: Sottaṃ pādena bodheti, tenāhaṃ brāhmaṇā sukhī.
anya-e0903n:435: Na hi mayhaṃ brāhmaṇa, paccūsamhi iṇāyikā;
anya-e0903n:436: Detha dethāti codenti, tenāhaṃ brāhmaṇā sukhī.
anya-e0903n:437_0: Pucchā – imañca panāvuso dhammadesanaṃ sutvā so bhāradvājagotto brāhmaṇo imasmiṃ
anya-e0903n:437_1: dhammavinaye pasanno kīdisaṃ pasannākāramakāsi. Kīva mahantañca imasmiṃ dhammavinaye atthaṃ sampādesi.
anya-e0903n:438_0: Vissajjanā – imañca pana bhante dhammadesanaṃ sutvā so bhāradvājagotto brāhmaṇo “abhikkantaṃ
anya-e0903n:438_1: bho gotama abhikkantaṃ bho gotama, seyyathāpi bhogotama, nikkujjitaṃ vā ukkujjeyya,
anya-e0903n:438_2: paṭicchannaṃ vā vivareyya, mūḷhassa vā maggaṃ ācikkheyya, andhakāre vā telapajjotaṃ
anya-e0903n:438_3: dhāreyya, cakkhumanto rūpāni dukkhantī”ti evamādinā imasmi dhammavinaye pasanno pasannākāramakāsi.
anya-e0903n:438_4: Bhagavato ca santike “labheyyāhaṃ bhoto gotamassa santike pabbajaṃ, labheyyaṃ upasampada”nti
anya-e0903n:438_5: evamādinā pabbajjaṃ upasampadaṃ yācitvā acirūpasampanno yāva arahattā mahantaṃ visesaṃ sampādesi.
anya-e0903n:440: Pucchā – tatthāvuso ekādasamaṃ mahākassapādīhi porāṇadhammasaṃgāhakatherehi saṃgītaṃ kasibhāradvājasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:441: Vissajjanā – magadhesu bhante dakkhiṇāgirismiṃ ekanāḷāyaṃ brāhmaṇagāme kasibhāradvājaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Kasibhāradvājo bhante brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi.
anya-e0903n:442: “Kassako paṭijānāsi, na ca passāmi te kasiṃ. Kassako pucchito brūhi, kathaṃ jānemu taṃ kasi”nti. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ–
anya-e0903n:443: “Saddhā bījaṃ tapo vuṭṭhi, paññā me yuganaṅgalaṃ;
anya-e0903n:444: Hirī īsā mano yottaṃ, sati me phālapācanaṃ.
anya-e0903n:446: Saccaṃ karomi niddānaṃ, soraccaṃ me pamocanaṃ.
anya-e0903n:448: Gacchati anivattantaṃ, yattha gantvā na socati.
anya-e0903n:449: Evamesā kasī kaṭṭhā, sā hoti amatapphalā;
anya-e0903n:452: Kassako paṭijānāsi, na ca passāmi te kasiṃ;
anya-e0903n:453: Kassako pucchito brūhi, kathaṃ jānemu taṃ kasiṃ.
anya-e0903n:454: Saddhā bījaṃ tapo vuṭṭhi, paññā me yuganaṅgalaṃ;
anya-e0903n:455: Hirī īsā mano yottaṃ, sati me phālapācanaṃ.
anya-e0903n:456: Pucchā – imañca panāvuso dhammadesanaṃ sutvā so kasibhāradvājo brāhmaṇo imasmiṃ dhammavinaye pasanno kīdisaṃ pasannākāramakāsi.
anya-e0903n:457_0: Vissajjanā – imañca pana bhante dhammadesanaṃ sutvā kasibhāradvājo brāhmaṇo “abhikkantaṃ
anya-e0903n:457_1: bho gotama, abhikkantaṃ bho gotamā”tievamādinā imasmiṃ dhammavinaye pasanno pasannākāramakāsi.
anya-e0903n:458: Seyyathāpi bho gotama ukkujjitaṃ vā nikkujjeyya.
anya-e0903n:460: Pucchā – udayasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:461_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante udayaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Udayo bhante brāhmaṇo
anya-e0903n:461_1: bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “pakaṭṭhakoyaṃ samaṇo gotamo punappunaṃ āgacchatī”ti. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ–
anya-e0903n:462: Punappunañceva vapanti bījaṃ, punappunaṃ vassati devarājā;
anya-e0903n:463: Punappunaṃ khettaṃ kasanti kassakā, punappunaṃ dhaññamupeti raṭṭhaṃ.
anya-e0903n:465: Punappunaṃ ceva vapanti bījaṃ, punappunaṃ vassati deva rājā;
anya-e0903n:466: Punappunaṃ khettaṃ kasanti kassakā, punappunaṃ dhaññamupeti raṭṭhaṃ.
anya-e0903n:467: Punappunaṃ yācakā yācayanti, punappunaṃ dānapatī dadanti;
anya-e0903n:468: Punappunaṃ dānapatī daditvā, punappunaṃ saggamupeti ṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0903n:469: Punappunaṃ khīranikā duhanti, punappunaṃ vaccho upeti mātaraṃ;
anya-e0903n:470: Punappunaṃ kilamati phandati ca, punappunaṃ gabbhamupeti mando.
anya-e0903n:471: Punappunaṃ jāyati mīyati ca, punappunaṃ sivathikaṃ haranti;
anya-e0903n:472: Maggañca laddhā apunabbhavāya, na punappunaṃ jāyati bhūripañño-hu–
anya-e0903n:474: Pucchā – mātuposakasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:475_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante mātuposakaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Mātuposako
anya-e0903n:475_1: bhante brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “ahañhi bho gotama dhammena bhikkhaṃ pariyesāmi,
anya-e0903n:475_2: dhammena bhikkhaṃ pariyesitvā mātāpitaro posemi, kaccāhaṃ bho gotama evaṃkārī kiccakārī
anya-e0903n:475_3: homī”ti, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “taggha tvaṃ brāhmaṇa evaṃkārī kiccakārī hosi,
anya-e0903n:475_4: yo kho brāhmaṇa dhammena bhikkhaṃ pariyesati, dhammena bhikkhaṃ pariyesitvā mātāpitaro
anya-e0903n:475_5: poseti, bahuṃ so puññaṃ pasavatī”ti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā bhāsitā.
anya-e0903n:476: Yo mātaraṃ vā pitaraṃ vā, macco dhammena posati;
anya-e0903n:478: Idheva naṃ pasaṃsanti, pecca sagge pamodati–
anya-e0903n:480: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena brāhmaṇasaṃyutte khomadussasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:481_0: Vissajjanā – sakkesu bhante khomadusse nāma sakyānaṃ nigame khomadussake brāhmaṇagahapatike
anya-e0903n:481_1: ārabbha bhāsita, khomadussakā bhante brāhmaṇagahapatikā bhagavantaṃ etadavocuṃ “ke
anya-e0903n:481_2: ca muṇḍakā samaṇakā, ke ca sabhādhammaṃ jānissantī”ti.
anya-e0903n:484: Santo na te ye na vadanti dhammaṃ;
anya-e0903n:489: Santo na te ye na vadanti dhammaṃ;
anya-e0903n:494: Pucchā – vaṅgīsasaṃyutte panāvuso catutthaṃ saṃṅgītaṃ ānandasuttaṃ katthakaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kena kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:495_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ vaṅgīsattheraṃ ārabbha āyasmatā ānandattherena
anya-e0903n:495_1: dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena bhāsitaṃ. Āyasmatā bhante vaṅgīso āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi–
anya-e0903n:501: Saṅkhāre parato passa, dukkhato mā ca attato;
anya-e0903n:507: Evaṃ kho bhante āyasmatā ānandattherena dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:512: Saṅkhāre paratopassa, dukkhato mā ca attato;
anya-e0903n:519: Pucchā – tattha āvuso dvādasamaṃ vaṅgīsasuttaṃ kattha kena kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:520: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmatā vaṅgīsattherena acira arahattappattena vimuttisukhapaṭisaṃvedinā–
anya-e0903n:523: So me dhamma madesesi, khandhāyatana dhātuyo;
anya-e0903n:525: Bahunnaṃ vata atthāya, bodhiṃ ajjhagamā muni;
anya-e0903n:527: Svāgataṃ vata me āsi, mama buddhassa santike;
anya-e0903n:528: Tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ;
anya-e0903n:536: Bahunnaṃ vata atthāya, bodhiṃ ajjhagamā muni;
anya-e0903n:538: Svāgataṃ vata me āsi, mama buddhassa santike;
anya-e0903n:539: Tasso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.
anya-e0903n:544: Pucchā – vanasaṃyutte panāvuso pañcamaṃ saṃgītaṃ ānandasuttaṃ kadā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kena kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:545_0: Vissajjanā – kosalesu bhante aññatarasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe aciraparinibbute bhagavati āyasmantaṃ
anya-e0903n:545_1: ānandaṃ ārabbha tasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe adhivatthāya devatāya bhāsitaṃ. Āyasmā bhante ānando
anya-e0903n:545_2: aciraparinibbute bhagavati ativelaṃ gihisaññattibahulo viharati, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ–
anya-e0903n:550: Evaṃ kho bhante vanasaṇḍe adhivatthāya devatāya āyasmato ānandattherassa anukampikāya atthakāmāya bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:551: Rukkhamūla gahanaṃ pasakkiya, nibbānaṃ hadayasmiṃ opiya;
anya-e0903n:552: Jhāya gotama mā pamādo, kiṃ te biḷibiḷikā karissati-hu–
anya-e0903n:555: Pucchā – yakkhasaṃyutte panāvuso paṭhamaṃ saṃgītaṃ indakasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:556_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante indakūṭe pabbate indakassa yakkhassa bhavane indakaṃ
anya-e0903n:556_1: yakkhaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Indako bhante yakkho attavādo bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā gāthāya ajjhabhāsi–
anya-e0903n:563: Abbudā jāyate pesi, pesi nibbattatī ghano;
anya-e0903n:564: Ghanā pasākhā jāyanti, kesā lomā nakhāpica;
anya-e0903n:565: Yañcassa bhuñjatī mātā, annaṃ pānañca bhojanaṃ;
anya-e0903n:569: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena yakkhasaṃyutte āḷavakasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:570: Vissajjanā – āḷaviyaṃ bhante āḷavakassa yakkhassa bhavane āḷavakaṃ yakkhaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Āḷavako bhante yakkho bhagavantaṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi–
anya-e0903n:581: Na khvāhaṃ taṃ āvuso nikkhamissāmi, yaṃ te karaṇīyaṃ, taṃ karohi,
anya-e0903n:582: Pañhaṃ taṃ samaṇa pucchissāmi, sace me na byākarissasi, cittaṃ vā te khipissāmi, hadayaṃ vā te phālessāmi, pādesu vā gahetvā pāragaṅgāya khipissāmi–
anya-e0903n:583: Kiṃ sūkha vittaṃ purisassa seṭṭhaṃ, kiṃ su suciṇṇaṃ sukhamāvahāti;
anya-e0903n:584: Kiṃ su have sādubharaṃ rasānaṃ, kathaṃ jīviṃ jīvitamāhu seṭṭhaṃ–
anya-e0903n:585: Saddhīdha vittaṃ purisassa seṭṭhaṃ, dhammo suciṇṇo sukhamāvahāti;
anya-e0903n:586: Saccaṃ have sādutaraṃ rasānaṃ, paññājīviṃ jīvitamāhu seṭṭhaṃ;
anya-e0903n:587: Kathaṃsu tarati oghaṃ, kathaṃsu tarati aṇṇavaṃ;
anya-e0903n:591: Kathaṃsu labhate paññaṃ, kathaṃsu vindate dhanaṃ;
anya-e0903n:592: Kathaṃsu kittiṃ pappoti, kathaṃ mittāni ganthati;
anya-e0903n:593: Asmā lokā paraṃ lokaṃ, kathaṃ pecca na socati–
anya-e0903n:597: Saccena kittiṃ pappoti, dadaṃ mittāni ganthati;
anya-e0903n:598: Asmā lokā paraṃ lokaṃ, evaṃ pecca na socati;
anya-e0903n:600: Saccaṃ dhammo dhiti cāgo, sa ve peccana socati–
anya-e0903n:603: Pucchā – sakkasaṃyutte panāvuso vatapadasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:604_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha sakkassa bhikkhave devānamindassa
anya-e0903n:604_1: pubbe manussabhūtassa satta vatapadāni samattāni samādinnāni ahesuṃ, yesaṃ samādinnattā
anya-e0903n:604_2: sakko sakkattaṃ ajjhagāti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:605: Sakkassa bhikkhave devānamindassa pubbe manussabhūtassa imāni satta vatapadāni samattāni samādinnāni ahesuṃ.
anya-e0903n:611_0: Pucchā – daliddasuttaṃ panāvuso kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ. Vissajjanā.
anya-e0903n:611_1: Rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “bhūtapubbaṃ bhikkhave aññataro puriso
anya-e0903n:611_2: imasmiṃyeva rājagahe manussadaliddo ahosi manussakapaṇo manussavarāko, so tathāgatappavedite
anya-e0903n:611_3: dhammavinaye saddhaṃ samādiyi, sīlaṃ, sutaṃ, cāgaṃ, paññaṃ samādiyī”ti evamādinā
anya-e0903n:615: Pucchā – yajamānasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:616: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante sakkaṃ devānamindaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Sakko bhante devānamindo bhagavantaṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi–
anya-e0903n:618: Karotaṃ opadhikaṃ puññaṃ, kattha dinnaṃ mahapphala”nti.
anya-e0903n:623: Karotaṃ opadhikaṃ puññaṃ, saṅghe dinnaṃ mahapphalaṃ”nti.
anya-e0903n:626: Karotaṃ opadhitaṃ puññaṃ, kattha dinnaṃ mahapphalaṃ–
anya-e0903n:627: Cattāro ca paṭipannā, cattāro ca phale ṭhitā;
anya-e0903n:630: Karotaṃ opadhikaṃ puññaṃ, saṅghe dinnaṃ mahapphalaṃ–
anya-e0903n:632: Pucchā – gahaṭṭhavandanāsuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:633: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “bhūtapubbaṃ bhikkhave sakko devānamindo mātaliṃ saṅgāhakaṃ āmantesī”ti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:634: Taṃ namassanti tevijjā, sabbe bhummāca khattiyā;
anya-e0903n:636: Athako nāma so yakkho, yaṃ tvaṃ sakka namassasi–
anya-e0903n:640: Dhammena dāraṃ posenti, te namassāmi mātali.
anya-e0903n:644: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena nidānavaggasaṃyutte paṭhamaṃ saṃgītaṃ paṭiccasamuppādasuttaṃ kattha taṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:645_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante pañcasate janapadavāsino bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:645_1: Pañcasatā bhante janapadavāsino bhikkhū sabbe ugghāṭitaññuno dhutaṅgadharā āraddhavīriyā
anya-e0903n:645_2: yuttayogā vipassakā saṇhaṃ sukhumaṃ suññataṃ paccayākāradhammadesanaṃ patthayamānā
anya-e0903n:645_3: bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā bhagavantaṃ parivāretvā nisīdiṃsu. Tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ “paṭiccasamuppādaṃ
anya-e0903n:645_4: vo bhikkhave desessāmi, taṃ suṇātha sādhukaṃ manasi karotha, bhāsissāmī”ti evamādinā
anya-e0903n:646_0: Katamo ca bhikkhave paṭiccasamuppādo. Avijjāpaccayā bhikkhave saṅkhārā, saṅkhārapaccayā
anya-e0903n:646_2: evametassa kevalassa dukkhandhassa samudayo hoti. Ayaṃ vuccati bhikkhave paṭiccasamuppādo.
anya-e0903n:647_0: Avijjāya tveva asesavirāganirodho saṅkhāranirodho (peyyāla) jātinirodhā jarāmaraṇaṃ
anya-e0903n:647_1: sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā nirujjhanti, evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa nirodho hoti –
anya-e0903n:649: Pucchā – tatthāvuso dutiyaṃ saṃgītaṃ vibhaṅgasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:650_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante pañcasate janapadavāsino vipañcitaññuno bhikkhū ārabbha
anya-e0903n:650_1: bhāsitaṃ. Pañcasatā bhante janapadavāsikā bhikkhū vipañcitaññuno dhutaṅgadharā āraddhavīriyā
anya-e0903n:650_2: yuttayogā vissakā saṇhaṃ sukhumaṃ suññatapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ paccayākāradhammadesanaṃ patthayamānā
anya-e0903n:650_3: bhagavantaṃ parivāretvā nisīdiṃsu. Tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ “paṭicca samuppādaṃ vo bhikkhave
anya-e0903n:650_4: dedessāmi vibhajissāmi, taṃ suṇātha sādhukaṃ manasikarotha, bhāsissāmī”ti evamādinā
anya-e0903n:652: Pucchā – pañcaverabhayasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:653_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante anāthapiṇḍikaṃ gahapatiṃ ārabbha “yato kho gahapati
anya-e0903n:653_1: ariyasāvakassa pañca bhayāni verāni vūpasantāni honti, catūhi ca sotāpattiyaṅgehi
anya-e0903n:653_2: samannāgato hoti, ariyo cassa ñāyo paññāya sudiṭṭho hoti suppaṭividdho, so ākaṅkhamāno
anya-e0903n:653_3: attanāva attānaṃ byākareyya khīṇanirayomi khīṇatiracchānayoni khīṇapettivisayo khīṇāpāyaduggativinipāto,
anya-e0903n:653_4: sotāpannohamasmi avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyano”ti evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:654: Pucchā – kathañcāvusotattha bhagavatā ariyasāvakassa pañcannaṃ bhayānaṃ verānaṃ vūpasantatā pakāsitā.
anya-e0903n:655_0: Vissajjanā – “katamāni pañca bhayāni verāni vūpasantāni honti. Yaṃ gahapati pāṇātipātī
anya-e0903n:655_1: pāṇātipātapaccayā diṭṭhadhammikampi bhayaṃ veraṃ pasavati, samparāyikampi bhayaṃ
anya-e0903n:655_2: veraṃ pasavati, cetasikampi dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedayati. Pāṇātipātā ṭiviratassa
anya-e0903n:655_3: evaṃ taṃ bhayaṃ veraṃ vūpasantaṃ hotī”ti evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā ariyasāvakassa
anya-e0903n:656: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā ariyasāvakassa catūhi sotāpattiyaṅgehi samannāgatatā pakāsitā.
anya-e0903n:657_0: Vissajjanā – katamehi catūhi sotāpattiyaṅgehi samannāgato hoti. Idha gahapati ariyasāvako
anya-e0903n:657_1: buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti “itipiso bhagavā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho vijjācaraṇasampanno
anya-e0903n:657_2: sugato lokavidū anuttaropurisadammasārathi satthādevamanussānaṃ buddho bhagavā”ti
anya-e0903n:657_3: evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā ariyasāvakassa catūhi sotāpattiyaṅgehi samannāgatatā pakāsitā.
anya-e0903n:658: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā ariyasāvakena ariyassa ñāyassa paññāya sudiṭṭhatā suppaṭividdhatā pakāsitā.
anya-e0903n:659_0: Vissajjanā – katamo cassa ariyo ñāyo paññāya sudiṭṭho hoti suppaṭividdho. Idha gahapati
anya-e0903n:659_1: ariyasāvako paṭiccasamuppādaññeva sādhukaṃ yoniso manasi karoti “iti imasmiṃ sati
anya-e0903n:659_2: idaṃ hoti, imasmiṃ asati idaṃ na hoti, imassuppādā idaṃ uppajjati, imassa nirodhā
anya-e0903n:659_3: idaṃ nirujjhati, yadidaṃ avijjāpaccayā (peyyāla) evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa
anya-e0903n:659_4: nirodho hotī”ti, evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā tattha ariyasāvakena ariyassa ñāyassa
anya-e0903n:660_0: Yato kho gahapati ariyasāvakassa imāni pañca bhayāni verāni vūpasantāni honti. Imehi
anya-e0903n:660_1: catūhi sotāpattiyaṅgehi samannāgato hoti. Ayañcassa ariyo ñāyo paññāya sudiṭṭho hoti suppaṭividdho–
anya-e0903n:662: Pucchā – dukkhasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:663: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “dukkhassa bhikkhave samudayañca atthaṅgamañca desessāmī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:664: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā dukkhasamudayo pakāsito.
anya-e0903n:665_0: Vissajjanā – katamo ca bhikkhave dukkhassa samudayo. Cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati
anya-e0903n:665_1: cakkhuviññāṇaṃ, tiṇṇaṃ saṅgati phasso, phassapaccayā vedanā, vedanāpaccayā taṇhā.
anya-e0903n:665_2: Ayaṃ kho bhikkhave dukkhassa samudayo. Sotañca paṭicca sadde ca uppajjati sotaviññāṇaṃ…pe…
anya-e0903n:665_3: ghānañca paṭicca gandhe ca…pe… jivhañca paṭicca rase ca…pe… kāyañca paṭicca phoṭṭhabbe
anya-e0903n:665_4: ca…pe… manañca paṭicca dhamme ca uppajjati manoviññāṇaṃ, tiṇṇaṃ saṅgati phasso, phassapaccayā
anya-e0903n:665_5: vedanā, vedanāpaccayā taṇhā. Ayaṃ kho bhikkhave dukkhassa samudayoti evaṃkho bhante
anya-e0903n:666: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā dukkhassa atthaṅgamo pakāsito.
anya-e0903n:667_0: Vissajjanā – katamo ca bhikkhave dukkhassa atthaṅgamo. Cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca
anya-e0903n:667_1: uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇaṃ, tiṇṇaṃ saṅgati phasso, phassapaccayā vedanā, vedanāpaccayā
anya-e0903n:667_2: taṇhā, tassāyeva taṇhāya asesavirāganirodhā upādānanirodho upādānanirodhā bhavanirodho,
anya-e0903n:667_4: nirujjhanti. Evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa nirodho hotīti evamādinā bhante
anya-e0903n:669: Pucchā – puttamaṃsūpamasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:670_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule adhunā pabbajite bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:670_1: Bhagavato ca bhante bhikkhusaṅghassa ca mahālābhasakkāro udapādi, ekacce ca bhante
anya-e0903n:670_2: bhikkhū navā acirapabbajitā kulaputtā āhāraṃ apaccavekkhitvā paribhuñjiṃsu. Tasmiṃ
anya-e0903n:670_3: bhante vatthusmiṃ “cattārome bhikkhave āhārā bhūtānaṃ vā sattānaṃ ṭhitiyā sambhavesīnaṃ
anya-e0903n:670_4: vā anuggahāya. Katame cattāro kabaḷīkāro āhāro oḷāriko vā sukhumo vā phasso dutiyo
anya-e0903n:670_5: manosañcetanā tatiyā viññāṇaṃ catuttha”nti evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:671: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha kabaḷīkārassa āhārassa daṭṭhabbākāro bhagavatā pakāsito.
anya-e0903n:672_0: Vissajjanā – seyyathāpi bhikkhave dve jāyampatikā parittaṃ sambalaṃ ādāya kantāramaggaṃ
anya-e0903n:672_1: paṭipajjeyyuṃ. Tesamassa ekaputtako piyo manāpoti evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā
anya-e0903n:673: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā phassāhārassa daṭṭhabbākāro pakāsito.
anya-e0903n:674_0: Vissajjanā – seyyathāpi bhikkhave gāvī niccammā kuṭṭaṃ ce nissāya tiṭṭheyya, ye kuṭṭanissitā
anya-e0903n:674_1: pāṇā, te naṃ khādeyyuṃ. Rukkhaṃ ce nissāya tiṭṭheyya. Udakaṃ ce nissāya tiṭṭheyya.
anya-e0903n:674_2: Ākāsaṃ ce nissāya tiṭṭheyya, ye ākāsanissitā pāṇā, te naṃ khādeyyunti evamādinā bhante
anya-e0903n:674_3: tattha bhagavatā phassassa āhārassa daṭṭhabbākāro vitthāretvā pakāsito.
anya-e0903n:675: Evameva khvāhaṃ bhikkhave phassāhāro daṭṭhabboti vadāmi.
anya-e0903n:676: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā manosañcetanāhārassa daṭṭhabbākāro pakāsito.
anya-e0903n:677_0: Vissajjanā – seyyathāpi bhikkhave aṅgārakāsu sādhikaporisā puṇṇā aṅgārānaṃ vītaccikānaṃ
anya-e0903n:677_1: vītadhūmānaṃ. Atha puriso āgaccheyya jīvitukāmo amaritukāmo sukha kāmo dukkhappaṭikūloti
anya-e0903n:677_2: evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā manosañcetanāhārassa daṭṭhabbākāro vitthārena pakāsito.
anya-e0903n:678: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā viññāṇāhārassa daṭṭhabbākāro pakāsito.
anya-e0903n:679_0: Vissajjanā – seyyathāpi bhikkhave coraṃ āgucāriṃ gahetvā rañño dasseyyuṃ “ayaṃ te
anya-e0903n:679_1: devacoro āgucārī, imassa yaṃ icchasi, taṃ daṇḍaṃ paṇehī”ti evamādinā bhante tattha
anya-e0903n:681: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena susimaparibbājaka suttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:682_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante āyasmantaṃ susimaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Āyasmā bhante susimo
anya-e0903n:682_1: yāvatako bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ ahosi kathāsallāpo, taṃ sabbaṃ bhagavato ārocesi. Tasmiṃ
anya-e0903n:682_2: vatthusmiṃ “pubbe kho susima dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇaṃ, pacchā nibbāne ñāṇa”nti evamādinā
anya-e0903n:683: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavā āyasmato susimattherassa sampatiarahattapattassa anuyogavasena paṭipucchitvā paṭipucchitvā uttari dhammadesanaṃ vitthāretvā desesi.
anya-e0903n:684_0: Vissajjanā – jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇanti susima passasīti. Evaṃ bhante. Bhavapaccayā
anya-e0903n:684_1: jātīti susima passasīti. Evaṃ bhanteti evamādinā bhante bhagavā tattha āyasmato susimassa
anya-e0903n:684_2: sampatiarahattapattassa uttaripi anuyogavasena paṭipucchitvā paṭipucchitvā vitthārato dhammaṃ desesi.
anya-e0903n:685: Tassa me bhante bhagavā accayaṃ accayato paṭiggaṇhātu āyatiṃsaṃvarāya–
anya-e0903n:688: Pucchā – abhisamayasaṃyutte panāvuso paṭhamaṃ saṃgītaṃ nakhasikhāsuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:689_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “taṃ kiṃ maññatha bhikkhave,
anya-e0903n:689_1: katamaṃ nu kho bahutaraṃ, yo vāyaṃ mayā paritto nakhasikhāyaṃ paṃsuāropito, ayaṃ
anya-e0903n:692: Pucchā – dhātusaṃyutte panāvuso caṅkamasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:693_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “dhātusova bhikkhave sattā
anya-e0903n:693_1: saṃsandanti samenti, hīnādhimuttikā hīnādhimuttikehi saddhiṃ saṃsandanti samenti,
anya-e0903n:693_2: kalyāṇādhimuttikā kalyāṇādhimuttikehi saddhiṃ saṃsandanti samentī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:695: Pucchā – assaddhasaṃsandanasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:696_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “dhātusova bhikkhave sattā
anya-e0903n:696_1: saṃsandanti samenti, assaddhā assaddhehi saddhiṃ saṃsandanti samenti, ahirikā ahirikehi
anya-e0903n:696_2: saddhiṃ saṃsandanti samenti, anottappino. Appassutā. Kusītā. Muṭṭhassatino. Duppaññā
anya-e0903n:696_3: duppaññehi saddhiṃ saṃsandanti samentī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:699: Pucchā – anamataggasaṃyutte āvuso dutiyaṃ saṃgītaṃ pathavīsuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:700_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “anamataggoyaṃ bhikkhave
anya-e0903n:700_1: saṃsāro, pubbā koṭi na paññāyati avijjānīvaraṇānaṃ sattānaṃ taṇhāsaṃyojanānaṃ sandhāvataṃ
anya-e0903n:700_2: saṃsarataṃ. Seyyathāpi bhikkhave puriso imaṃ mahāpathaviṃ kolaṭṭhimattaṃ kolaṭṭhimattaṃ
anya-e0903n:700_3: mattikāguḷikaṃ karitvā nikkhipeyya ‘ayaṃ me piyā, tassa me pitu ayaṃ pitā’ti. Apariyādinnāva
anya-e0903n:700_4: bhikkhave tassa purisassa pitupitaro assu. Athāyaṃ mahāpathavī parikkhayaṃ pariyādānaṃ
anya-e0903n:700_5: gaccheyya. Taṃ kissahetu, anamataggoyaṃ bhikkhave saṃsāro, pubbā koṭi na paññāyati
anya-e0903n:700_6: avijjānīvaraṇānaṃ sattānaṃ taṇhā saṃyojanānaṃ sandhāvataṃ saṃsarataṃ” evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:701: Evaṃ dīgharattaṃ vo bhikkhave dukkhaṃ paccanubhūtaṃ tibbaṃ paccanubhūtaṃ byasanaṃ paccanubhūtaṃ kaṭasī vaḍḍhitā.
anya-e0903n:705: Pucchā – tatthāvuso tatiyaṃ saṃgītaṃ assusuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:706_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahuleyeva bhikkhū ārabbha “taṃ kiṃ maññatha bhikkhave,
anya-e0903n:706_1: katamaṃ nu kho bahutaraṃ, yaṃ vā vo iminā dīghena addhunā sandhāvataṃ saṃsarataṃ
anya-e0903n:706_2: amanāpasampayogā manāpavippayogā kandantānaṃ rodantānaṃ assu passannaṃ paggharitaṃ,
anya-e0903n:706_3: yaṃ vā catūsu mahāsamuddesu udaka”nti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:708: Pucchā – tatthāvuso chaṭṭhaṃ saṃgītaṃ sāsapasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:709_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Aññataro bhante
anya-e0903n:709_1: bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “kīvadīgho nu kho bhante kappo”ti. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ
anya-e0903n:709_2: “dīgho kho bhikkhu kappo, so na sukaro saṅkhātuṃ ettakāni vassāni itivā, (peyyāla)
anya-e0903n:709_3: ettakāni vassasatasahassāni itivāti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:711: Pucchā – tenāvuso…pe… sammāsambuddhena anamataggasaṃyutte gaṅgāsuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:712: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante aññataraṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Aññataro bhante brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “kīva-
anya-e0903n:713_0: Bahukā nu kho bho gotama kappā abbhatītā atikkantā”ti. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “bahukā
anya-e0903n:713_1: kho brāhmaṇa kappā abbhatītā atikkantā, te na sukarā saṅkhātuṃ ‘ettakā kappā’ iti
anya-e0903n:713_2: vā ‘ettakāni kappasatāni’ iti vā ‘ettakāni kappasahassāni’ itivā ‘ettakāni kappasatasahassāni’
anya-e0903n:713_3: iti vā”ti eva mādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:715: Pucchā – puggalasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:716_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “anamataggoyaṃ bhikkhave saṃsāro,
anya-e0903n:716_1: pubbākoṭi na paññāyati avijjā nīvaraṇānaṃ sattānaṃ taṇhāsaṃyojanānaṃ sandhāvataṃ
anya-e0903n:716_2: saṃsarataṃ. Ekapuggalassa bhikkhave kappaṃ sandhāvato saṃsarato siyā evaṃ mahā aṭṭhikaṅkalo
anya-e0903n:716_3: aṭṭhipuñjo aṭṭhirāsi, yathā yaṃ vepullo pabbato. Sace saṃhārako assa, sambhatañca
anya-e0903n:718: Pucchā – tatthāvuso duggatasuttañca sukhitasuttañca bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:719_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “anamataggoyaṃ bhikkhave
anya-e0903n:719_1: saṃsāro, pubbā koṭi na paññāyati avijjānīvaraṇānaṃ sattānaṃ taṇhāsaṃyojanānaṃ sandhāvataṃ
anya-e0903n:719_2: saṃsarataṃ. Yaṃ bhikkhave passeyyātha duggataṃ durūpetaṃ, niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṃ
anya-e0903n:719_3: ‘amhehipi evarūpaṃ paccanubhūtaṃ iminā dīghena addhunā’ti, yaṃ bhikkhave passeyyātha
anya-e0903n:720: Niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṃ, “amhehipi paccanubhūtaṃ iminā dīghena addhunā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:722: Pucchā – tiṃsamattasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:723_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante tiṃsamatte pāveyyake bhikkhū ārabbha “anamataggoyaṃ
anya-e0903n:723_1: bhikkhave saṃsāro, pubbākoṭi na paññāyati avijjānīvaraṇānaṃ sattānaṃ taṇhāsaṃyojanānaṃ
anya-e0903n:723_2: sandhāvataṃ saṃsarataṃ. Taṃ kiṃ maññatha bhikkhave, katamaṃ nu kho bahutaraṃ, yaṃ
anya-e0903n:723_3: vā vo iminā dīghena addhunā sandhāvataṃ saṃsarataṃ sīsacchinnānaṃ lohitaṃ passannaṃ
anya-e0903n:723_4: paggharitaṃ, yaṃ vā catūsu mahāsamuddesu udaka”nti evamādinā bhavagatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:725: Pucchā – mātusuttādīni panāvuso chasuttāni bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:726_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “anamataggoyaṃ bhikkhave
anya-e0903n:726_1: saṃsāro, pubbā koṭi na paññāyati avijjānīvaraṇānaṃ sattānaṃ taṇhāsaṃyojanānaṃ sandhāvataṃ
anya-e0903n:726_2: saṃsarataṃ. Na so bhikkhave satto sulabharūpo, yo na mātābhūtapubbo iminā dīghena
anya-e0903n:726_3: addhunā. Yo na pitābhūtapubbo. Yo na bhātābhūtapubbo. Yo na bhaginibhūtapubbo. Yo
anya-e0903n:726_4: na puttabhūtapubbo. Yo na dhītābhūtapubbo iminā dīghena addhunā”ti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:729: Pucchā – kassapasaṃyutte panāvuso candūpamasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:730_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “candūpamā bhikkhave kulāni
anya-e0903n:730_1: upasaṅkamatha apakasseva kāyaṃ apakassa cittaṃ niccanavakā kulesu appagabbhā. Seyyathāpi
anya-e0903n:730_2: bhikkhave puriso jarudapānaṃ vā olokeyya pabbatavisamaṃ vā nadīviduggaṃ vā apakasseva
anya-e0903n:730_3: kāyaṃ apakassa cittaṃ. Evameva kho bhikkhave candūpamā kulāni upasaṅkamatha apakasseva
anya-e0903n:730_4: kāyaṃ apakassa cittaṃ niccanavakā kulesu appagabbhā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:731: Taṃ kiṃ maññatha bhikkhave, kathaṃ rūpā bhikkhu arahati kulāni upasaṅkamituṃ.
anya-e0903n:732: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā parisuddhāparisuddha dhammadesanaṃ dassetvā bhikkhūnaṃ ovādo dinno.
anya-e0903n:733_0: Vissajjanā – “taṃ kiṃ maññatha bhikkhave, kathaṃ rūpassa bhikkhuno aparisuddhā dhammadesanā
anya-e0903n:733_1: hoti, kathaṃ rūpassa bhikkhuno parisuddhā dhammadesanā hotī”ti evamādinā parisuddhāparisuddhadhammadesanā
anya-e0903n:733_2: vitthārato dassetvā “kassapena vā hi vo bhikkhave ovadissāmi yo vā panassa kassapasadiso,
anya-e0903n:733_3: ovaditehi ca pana vo tathattāya paṭipajjitabba”nti. Evaṃ kho bhante bhagavato bhikkhūnaṃ ovādo dinno.
anya-e0903n:734: Yo hi koci bhikkhave bhikkhu evaṃcitto paresaṃ dhammaṃ deseti “aho vata me dhammaṃ suṇeyyuṃ, sutvā ca pana dhammaṃ pasīdeyyuṃ, pasannā ca me pasannākāraṃ kareyyuṃ–
anya-e0903n:735: Svākkhāto bhagavatā dhammo sandiṭṭhiko akāliko ehi passiko opaneyyiko paccattaṃ veditabbo viññūhi–
anya-e0903n:736: Kassapena vā hi vo bhikkhave ovadissāmi yo vā panassa kassapasadiso, ovaditehi ca pana vo tathattāya paṭipajjitabbaṃ–
anya-e0903n:738: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena kassapasaṃyutte catutthaṃ kulūpakasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:739_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “taṃ kiṃ maññatha bhikkhave,
anya-e0903n:739_1: kathaṃ rūpo bhikkhu arahati kulūpako hotuṃ, kathaṃ rūpo bhikkhu na arahati kulūpako
anya-e0903n:740: Kassapena vā hi vo bhikkhave ovadissāmi yo vā panassa kassapasadiso, ovaditehi ca pana vo tathattāya paṭipajjitabbaṃ.
anya-e0903n:742: Pucchā – tatthevāvuso bhagavatā dutiya ovādasuttaṃ kattha kena saddhiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:743_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante āyasmatā mahākassapena saddhiṃ “ovada kassapa bhikkhū,
anya-e0903n:743_1: karohi kassapa bhikkhūnaṃ dhammiṃ kathaṃ, ahaṃ vā kassapa bhikkhū ovadeyyaṃ tvaṃ
anya-e0903n:743_2: vā, ahaṃ vā bhikkhūnaṃ dhammiṃ kathaṃ kareyyaṃ tvaṃ vā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:744: Yassa kassaci bhante saddhā natthi kusalesu dhammesu, hirī natthi. Ottappaṃ natthi. Vīriyaṃ natthi. Paññā natthi kusalesu dhammesu.
anya-e0903n:746: Pucchā – tatthevāvuso bhagavatā tatiyaovādasuttaṃ kattha kena saddhiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:747_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante āyasmatāyeva mahākassapena saddhiṃ “ovada kassapa bhikkhū.
anya-e0903n:747_1: Karohi kassapa bhikkhūnaṃ dhammiṃ kathaṃ, ahaṃ vā kassapa bhikkhū ovadeyyaṃ tvaṃ
anya-e0903n:747_2: vā. Ahaṃ vā bhikkhūnaṃ dhammaṃ kathaṃ kareyyaṃ tvaṃ vā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:748: Dubbacā kho bhante etarahi bhikkhū dovacassakaraṇehi dhammehi samannāgatā akkhamā appadakkhiṇaggāhino anusāsaniṃ–
anya-e0903n:750: Pucchā – tatthevāvuso bhagavatā pariyosānaṃ saddhammappatirūpakasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:751_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃyeva mahākassapaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Āyasmā
anya-e0903n:751_1: bhante mahākassapo bhagavantaṃ etadevoca “ko nu kho bhante hetu ko paccayo, yena
anya-e0903n:751_2: pubbe appatarāni ceva sikkhāpadāni ahesuṃ, bahutarā ca bhikkhū aññāya saṇṭhahiṃsu.
anya-e0903n:751_3: Ko pana bhante hetu ko paccayo, yenetarahi bahutarāni ceva sakkhāpadāni appatarā
anya-e0903n:751_4: ca bhikkhū aññāya saṇṭhahantī”ti. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “evañcetaṃ kassapa hoti
anya-e0903n:751_5: sattesu hāyamānesu saddhamme antaradhāyamāne bahutarāniceva sikkhāpadāni honti, appatarāca
anya-e0903n:751_6: bhikkhū aññāya saṇṭhahantī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:754: Pucchā – tenāvuso…pe… sammāsambuddhena lābhasakkāraṃyutte pañcamaṃ saṃgītaṃ mīḷhakasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:755_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “dāruṇo bhikkhave lābhasakkārasiloko
anya-e0903n:755_1: pharuso antarāyiko anuttarassa yogakkhemassa adhigamāya. Seyyathāpi bhikkhave mīḷhakā
anya-e0903n:755_2: gūthādī gūthapūrā puṇṇā gūthassa, purato cassa mahāgūthapuñjo, sā tena aññā mīḷhakā
anya-e0903n:755_3: atimaññeyya “ahamhi gūthādī gūthapūrā puṇṇā gūthassa, purato ca myāyaṃ mahāgūthapuñjo”ti
anya-e0903n:756: Taṃ hi tassa bhikkhave moghapurisassa hoti dīgharattaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya.
anya-e0903n:758_0: Tasmātiha bhikkhave evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ, “uppannaṃ lābhasakkārasi lokaṃ pajahissāma,
anya-e0903n:758_1: na ca no uppanno lābhasakkārasiloko cittaṃ pariyādāya ṭhassabhī”ti, evañhi kho bhikkhave sikkhitabbaṃ.
anya-e0903n:760: Pucchā – tattho āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhakehi saṃgītaṃ ekaputtakasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbhaṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:761_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “dāruṇo bhikkhave lābhasakkārasiloko
anya-e0903n:761_1: kaṭuko pharuso antarāyiko anuttarassa yogakkhemassa adhigamāya, saddhā bhikkhave
anya-e0903n:761_2: upāsikā ekaputtakaṃ piyaṃ manāpaṃ evaṃ sammāāyācamānā āyāceyya tādiso tāta bhavāhi,
anya-e0903n:761_3: yādiso citto ca gahapati hatthako ca āḷavako”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:762: Esā bhikkhave tulā etaṃ pamāṇaṃ mama sāvakānaṃ upāsakānaṃ yadidaṃ citto ca gahapati hatthako ca āḷavako.
anya-e0903n:763: Sace kho tvaṃ tāta agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajasi, tādiso tāta bhavāhi, yādisā sāriputtamoggallānā.
anya-e0903n:764: Mā ca kho tvaṃ tāta sekhaṃ appattamānasaṃ lābhasakkārasiloko anupāpuṇātu–
anya-e0903n:765: Evaṃ dāruṇo bhikkhave lābhasakkārasiloko kaṭuko pharuso antarāyiko anuttarassa yogakkhemassa adhigamāya.
anya-e0903n:767: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāyakehi saṃgītaṃ ekadhītusuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:768_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃyeva bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “dāruṇo bhikkhave lābhasakkārasiloko
anya-e0903n:768_1: kaṭuko pharuso antarāyiko anuttarassa yogakkhemassa adhigamāya. Saddhā bhikkhave
anya-e0903n:768_2: upāsikā ekaṃ dhītaraṃ piyaṃ manāpaṃ evaṃ sammā āyācamānā āyāceyya ‘tādisā ayye bhavāhi,
anya-e0903n:768_3: yādisā khujjuttarā ca upāsikā veḷukaṇḍakiyā ca nandamātā’ti. Esā bhikkhave tulā etaṃ
anya-e0903n:768_4: pamāṇaṃ mama sāvikānaṃ upāsikānaṃ, yadidaṃ khujjuttarā ca upāsikā veḷukaṇḍakiyā ca
anya-e0903n:769: Sace kho tvaṃ ayye agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajasi, bhādisā ayye bhavāhi, yādisā khemā ca bhikkhunī uppalavaṇṇā ca–
anya-e0903n:772: Pucchā – rāhulasaṃyuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:773_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ rāhulaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Āyasmā bhante
anya-e0903n:773_1: rāhulo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “sādhu me bhante bhagavā saṃkhittena dhammaṃ desetu,
anya-e0903n:773_2: yamahaṃ bhagavato dhammaṃ sutvā eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto vihareyya”nti,
anya-e0903n:773_3: tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “taṃ kiṃ maññasi rāhula, cakkhuniccaṃ vā aniccaṃ vāti. Aniccaṃ
anya-e0903n:773_4: bhante. Yaṃ panāniccaṃ, dukkhaṃ vā taṃ sukhaṃ vāti. Dukkhaṃ bhante. Yaṃ panāniccaṃ
anya-e0903n:773_5: dukkhaṃ vipariṇāmadhammaṃ, kallaṃ nu taṃ samanupassituṃ ‘etaṃ mama, eso hamasmi,
anya-e0903n:773_6: eso me attā’ti. No hetaṃ bhante”ti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:776: Pucchā – lakkhaṇasaṃyutte panāvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhakattherehi paṭhamaṃ saṃgītaṃ aṭṭhisuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:777_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante āyasmantañca lakkhaṇaṃ āyasmantañca mahāmoggallānaṃ
anya-e0903n:777_1: ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Āyasmā bhante lakkhaṇo bhagavatā sammukhe āyasmantaṃ mahāmoggallānaṃ
anya-e0903n:777_2: etadavoca “idhāyasmā mahāmoggallāno gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto aññatarasmiṃ padese
anya-e0903n:777_3: sitaṃ pātvākāsi, ko nu kho āvuso moggallāna hetu, ko paccayo sitassa pātukammāyā”ti.
anya-e0903n:777_4: Āyasmā ca bhante mahāmoggallāno “idhāhaṃ āvuso gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṃ
anya-e0903n:777_5: aṭṭhikasaṅkhalikaṃ vehāsaṃ gacchantiṃ”ti evamādinā ārocesi. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ
anya-e0903n:777_6: “cakkhubhūtā vata bhikkhave sāvakā viharanti, ñāṇabhūtā vata bhikkhave sāvakā viharanti,
anya-e0903n:777_7: yatrahi nāma sāvako evarūpaṃ ñassati vā dakkhati vā sakkhiṃ vā karissatī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:778: Acchariyaṃ vata bho, abbhutaṃ vata bho;
anya-e0903n:781: Pucchā – tenāvuso jānatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena lakkhaṇasaṃyutte tatiyaṃ saṃgītaṃ piṇḍasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:782_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante āyasmantañca lakkhaṇaṃ āyasmantañca mahāmoggallānaṃ
anya-e0903n:782_1: ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Āyasmā bhante lakkhaṇo bhaggavato sammukhe āyasmantaṃ mahāmoggallānaṃ
anya-e0903n:782_2: etadavoca “idhāyasmā mahāmoggallāno gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto aññatarasmiṃ padese
anya-e0903n:782_3: sitaṃ pātvākāsi, ko nukho āvuso moggallānahetu, ko paccayo sitassa pātukammāyā”ti.
anya-e0903n:782_4: Āyasmā ca bhante mahāmoggallāno “idhāhaṃ āvuso gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṃ
anya-e0903n:782_5: maṃsapiṇḍaṃ vehāsaṃ gacchantaṃ, tamenaṃ gijjhāpi kākāpi kulalāpi anupatitvā anupatitvā
anya-e0903n:782_6: vitacchenti virājenti. Sā sudaṃ aṭṭassaraṃ karotī”ti evamādinā ārocesi. Tasmiṃ bhante
anya-e0903n:782_7: vatthusmiṃ “cakkhubhūtā vata bhikkhave sāvakā viharanti, ñāṇabhūtā vata bhikkhave
anya-e0903n:782_8: sāvakā viharanti, yatrahi nāma sāvako evarūpaṃ ñassati vā dakkhati vā sakkhiṃ vā
anya-e0903n:784: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhakehi mahātherehi saṃgītaṃ asilomasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:785_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante āyasmantañca lakkhaṇaṃ āyasmantañca mahāmoggallānaṃ
anya-e0903n:785_1: ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Āyasmā bhante lakkhaṇo bhagavato sammukhe āyasmantaṃ mahāmoggallānaṃ
anya-e0903n:785_2: etadavoca “ko nu kho āvuso moggallāna hetu, ko paccayo sitassa pātukammāyā”ti. Āyasmā
anya-e0903n:785_3: ca bhante mahāmoggallānatthero “idhāhaṃ āvuso gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṃ
anya-e0903n:785_4: asilomaṃ vehāsaṃ gacchantaṃ”ti evamādinā ārocesi. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ cakkhubhūtā
anya-e0903n:785_5: vata bhikkhave sāvakā viharanti, ñāṇabhūtā vata bhikkhave sāvakā viharanti. (Peyyāla)
anya-e0903n:785_6: eso bhikkhave satto imasmiṃyeva rājagahe sūkariko ahosī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:787: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhakamahātherehi saṃgītaṃ sūcilomasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:788: Vissajjanā – tattheva bhante rājagahe āyasmantañca lakkhaṇaṃ āyasmantañca mahāmoggallānaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Āyasmā bhante lakkhaṇo bhagavato sammukhe tatheva avoca.
anya-e0903n:789_0: Āyasmā ca bhante mahāmoggallāno tatheva ārocesi. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “cakkhubhūtā
anya-e0903n:789_1: vata bhikkhave sāvakā viharanti, ñāṇabhūtā vata bhikkhave sāvakā viharanti, (peyyāla)
anya-e0903n:789_2: eso bhikkhave satto imasmiṃyeva rājagahe sūto ahosī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitā.
anya-e0903n:791: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhakamahātherehi saṃgītāni pāpabhikkhusuttādīni pañcasuttāni bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitāni.
anya-e0903n:792_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe āyasmantañca lakkhaṇaṃ āyasmantañca mahāmoggallānaṃ ārabbha
anya-e0903n:792_1: bhāsitāni. Āyasmā bhante lakkhaṇo bhagavato sammukhe pubbe vuttanayeneva ārocesi.
anya-e0903n:792_2: Āyasmā ca bhante mahāmoggallāno “idhāhaṃ āvuso gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṃ
anya-e0903n:792_3: bhikkhuṃ vehāsaṃ gacchantaṃ. Addasaṃ bhikkhuniṃ vehāsaṃ gacchantiṃ. Addasaṃ sikkhamānaṃ
anya-e0903n:792_4: vehāsaṃ gacchantiṃ. Addasaṃ sāmaṇeraṃ vehāsaṃ gacchantaṃ. Addasaṃ sāmaṇeriṃ vehāsaṃ
anya-e0903n:792_5: gacchantiṃ. Tassā saṅghāṭipi ādittā sampajjalitā sajotibhūtā, pattopi āditto sampajjalito
anya-e0903n:792_6: sajotibhūto, kāyabandhanampi ādittaṃ sampajjalitaṃ sajotibhūtaṃ, kāyopi āditto sampajjalito
anya-e0903n:792_7: sajotibhūto, sā sudaṃ aṭṭassaraṃ karotī”ti evamādinā ārocesi. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ
anya-e0903n:792_8: “cakkhubhūtā vata bhikkhave sāvakā viharanti ñāṇabhūtā vata bhikkhave sāvakā viharanti.
anya-e0903n:792_9: (Peyyāla). Eso bhikkhave bhikkhu kassapassasammāsambuddhassa pāvacane pāpabhikkhu
anya-e0903n:792_10: ahosi. Esā bhikkhave bhikkhunī kassapassa sammāsambuddhassa pāvacane pāpabhikkhunī
anya-e0903n:792_11: ahosi. Esā bhikkhave sikkhamānā kassapassa sammāsambuddhassa pāvacane pāpasikkhamānā
anya-e0903n:792_12: ahosi. Eso bhikkhave sāmaṇero kassapassasammāsambuddhassa pāvacane pāpasāmaṇero ahosi.
anya-e0903n:792_13: Esā bhikkhave sāmaṇerī kassapassa sammāsambuddhassa pāvacane pāpasāmaṇerī ahosī”ti
anya-e0903n:795: Pucchā – opammasaṃyutte āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhakamahātherehi saṃgītaṃ nakhasikhasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:796_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “taṃ kiṃ maññatha bhikkhave,
anya-e0903n:796_1: katamaṃ nu kho bahutaraṃ, yo cāyaṃ mayā paritto nakhasikhāyaṃ paṃsu āropito, yā cāyaṃ
anya-e0903n:797: Taṃ kiṃ maññatha bhikkhave, katamaṃ nu kho bahutaraṃ.
anya-e0903n:800: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhakamahātherehi saṃgītaṃ āṇisuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:801_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃyeva bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “bhūtapubbaṃ bhikkhave
anya-e0903n:801_1: dasārahānaṃ ānako nāma mudiṅgo ahosi, tassa dasārahā ānake ghaṭite aññaṃ āṇiṃ odahiṃsu,
anya-e0903n:801_2: ahu kho so bhikkhave samayo yaṃ ānakassa mudiṅgassa porāṇaṃ pokkharaphalakaṃ antaradhāyi,
anya-e0903n:804: Pucchā – bhikkhusaṃyutte āvuso bhagavatā navasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:805_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ navaṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Aññataro
anya-e0903n:805_1: bhante navo bhikkhu pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto vihāraṃ pavisitvā apposukko
anya-e0903n:805_2: tuṇhībhūto saṅkasāyabhi, na bhikkhūnaṃ veyyāvaccaṃ karoti cīvarakārasamaye tasmiṃ
anya-e0903n:805_3: bhante vatthusmiṃ “mā kho tumhe bhikkhave etassa bhikkhuno ujjhāyitthā eso kho bhikkhave
anya-e0903n:805_4: bhikkhu catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ ābhicetasikānaṃ diṭṭhadhamma sukhavihārānaṃ nikāmalābhī
anya-e0903n:806: Ahampi kho bhante sakaṃ kiccaṃ karomi,
anya-e0903n:807: Eso kho bhikkhave bhikkhu catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ ābhicetasikānaṃ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārānaṃ nikāmalābhī akicchalābhī akasiralābhī –
anya-e0903n:811: Dhāreti antimaṃ dehaṃ, jetvā māraṃ savāhiniṃ–
anya-e0903n:815: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā jānatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena khandhavaggasaṃyutte paṭhamaṃ nakulapitusuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:816_0: Vissajjanā – bhaggesu bhante susumāragire bhesakaḷāvane migadāye nakulapitaraṃ gahapatiṃ
anya-e0903n:816_1: ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Nakulapitā bhante gahapati bhagavantaṃ “ahamasmi bhante jiṇṇo vuḍḍho
anya-e0903n:816_2: mahallako addhagato vayoanuppatto āturakāyo abhikkhaṇātaṅko, aniccadassāvī kho panāhaṃ
anya-e0903n:816_3: bhante bhagavato manobhāvanīyānañca bhikkhūnaṃ, ovadatu maṃ bhante bhagavā, anusāsatu
anya-e0903n:816_4: maṃ bhante bhagavā, yaṃ mamassa dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāyā”ti. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ
anya-e0903n:816_5: “evametaṃ gahapati, evametaṃ gahapati, āturo hāyaṃ gahapati kāyo aṇḍabhūto pariyonaddho,
anya-e0903n:816_6: yo hi gahapati imaṃ kāyaṃ pariharanto muhuttampi ārogyaṃ paṭijāneyya, kimaññatra
anya-e0903n:816_7: bālyā. Tasmātiha te gahapati evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ ‘āturakāyassa me sato cittaṃ anāturaṃ
anya-e0903n:816_8: bhavissatī’ti. Evañhi te gahapati sikkhitabba”nti. Evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:818: Pucchā – tañcāvuso bhagavatā saṃkhittena bhāsitaṃ vitthārena kena kathañca vibhattaṃ.
anya-e0903n:819_0: Vissajjanā – taṃ kho bhante bhagavatā saṃkhittena desitaṃ “kathañca gahapati āturakāyo
anya-e0903n:819_1: ceva hoti āturacitto ca. Idha gahapati assutavā puthujjano ariyānaṃ adassāvī ariyadhammassa
anya-e0903n:819_2: akovido ariyadhamme avinīto, sappurisānaṃ adassāvī sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme
anya-e0903n:819_3: avinīto rūpaṃ attato samanupassati rūpavantaṃ vā attānaṃ, attani vā rūpaṃ, rūpasmiṃ
anya-e0903n:819_4: vā attānaṃ, “ahaṃ rūpaṃ mama rūpa”nti pariyuṭṭhaṭṭhāyī hoti. Tassa “ahaṃ rūpaṃ mama
anya-e0903n:819_5: rūpa”nti pariyuṭṭhaṭṭhāyino taṃ rūpaṃ vipariṇamati aññathā hoti. Tassa rūpavipariṇāmaññathābhāvā
anya-e0903n:819_6: uppajjanti sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā”ti evamādinā bhante āyasmatā sāriputtena
anya-e0903n:821: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso dutiyavagge porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhaka mahātherehi paṭhamaṃ saṃgītaṃ aniccasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:822_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “rūpaṃ bhikkhaveaniccaṃ,
anya-e0903n:822_1: vedanā aniccā, saññā aniccā, saṅkhārā aniccā, viññāṇaṃ aniccaṃ. Evaṃ passaṃ bhikkhave
anya-e0903n:822_2: sutavā ariyasāvako rūpasmimpi nibbindati, vedanāyapi nibbindati, saññāyapi nibbindati,
anya-e0903n:822_3: saṅkhāresupi nibbindati, viññāṇasmimpi nibbindati, nibbindaṃ virajjati, virāgā vimuccati,
anya-e0903n:822_4: vimuttasmiṃ ‘vimutta’miti ñāṇaṃ hotī”ti. Evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:824: Pucchā – dukkhaanattasuttāni panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitāni.
anya-e0903n:825_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃyeva bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “rūpaṃ bhikkhave dukkhaṃ,
anya-e0903n:825_1: vedanā dukkhā, saññā dukkhā, saṅkhārā dukkhā, viññāṇaṃ dukkhaṃ. Rūpaṃ bhikkhave anattā,
anya-e0903n:825_2: vedanā anattā, saññā anattā, saṅkhārā anattā, viññāṇaṃ anattā. Evaṃ passaṃ bhikkhave
anya-e0903n:825_3: sutavā ariyasāvako rūpasmimpi nibbindati, vedanāyapi nibbindati, saññāyapi nibbindati,
anya-e0903n:825_4: saṅkhāresupi nibbindati, viññāṇasmimpi nibbindati, nibbindaṃ virajjati, virāgā vimuccati,
anya-e0903n:825_5: vimuttasmiṃ ‘vimutta’miti ñāṇaṃ hoti, khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ,
anya-e0903n:825_6: nāparaṃ itthattāyāti pajānātī”ti evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā bhāsitāni.
anya-e0903n:827: Pucchā – bhārasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:828_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃyeva bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “bhārañca vo bhikkhave
anya-e0903n:828_1: desessāmi bhārahārañca bhārādānañca bhāranikkhepanañca, taṃ suṇātha. Katamo ca bhikkhavebhāro,
anya-e0903n:828_2: ‘pañcupādānakkhandhā’ tissa vacanīyaṃ. Katame pañca, rūpupādānakkhandho vedanupādānakkhandho
anya-e0903n:828_3: saññupādānakkhandho saṅkhārupādānakkhandho viññāṇupādānakkhandho. Ayaṃ vuccati bhikkhave
anya-e0903n:829: Bhārā have pañcakkhandhā, bhārahāro ca puggalo;
anya-e0903n:831: Nikkhipitvā garuṃ bhāraṃ, aññaṃ bhāraṃ anādiya;
anya-e0903n:834: Pucchā – na tumhākasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:835: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃyeva bhante sambahule bhikkhu ārabbha “yaṃ bhikkhave natumhākaṃ taṃ pajahatha, taṃ vo pahīnaṃ hitāya sukhāyabhavissatī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:837: Pucchā – anattalakkhaṇasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:838_0: Vissajjanā – bārāṇasiyaṃ bhante isipatane migadāye pañcavaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha “rūpaṃ
anya-e0903n:838_1: bhikkhave anattā, rūpañca hidaṃ bhikkhave attā abhavissa, nayidaṃ rūpaṃ ābādhāya
anya-e0903n:838_2: saṃvatteyya, labbhetha ca rūpe evaṃ me rūpaṃ hotu, evaṃ me rūpaṃ mā ahosī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:840: Pucchā – theravagge panāvuso tatiyaṃ saṃgītaṃ yamakasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kena kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:841_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ yamakattheraṃ ārabbha āyasmatā sāriputtattherena
anya-e0903n:841_1: dhammasenāpatinā bhāsitaṃ. Āyasmato bhante yamakattherassa evarūpaṃ pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ
anya-e0903n:841_2: uppannaṃ hoti “tathāhaṃ bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmi, yathā khīṇāsavo bhikkhu
anya-e0903n:841_3: kāyassa bhedā ucchijjati vinassati, na hoti paraṃmaraṇā”ti. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ
anya-e0903n:841_4: “taṃ kiṃ maññasi āvuso yamaka, rūpaṃ niccaṃ vā aniccaṃ vā”ti evamādinā bhante āyasmatā
anya-e0903n:842_0: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha āyasmā sāriputtatthero dhammasenāpati āyasmato yamakattherassa
anya-e0903n:843_0: Vissajjanā – taṃ kiṃ maññasi āvuso yamaka, rūpaṃ ‘tathāgato’ti samanupassasīti. ‘No
anya-e0903n:843_1: hetaṃ āvuso’. Vedanaṃ. Saññaṃ. Saṅkhāre. Viññāṇaṃ ‘tathāgato’ti samanupassasīti.
anya-e0903n:843_2: ‘No hetaṃ āvuso’ti evamādinā bhante āyasmā sāriputtatthero dhammasenāpati āyasmato
anya-e0903n:843_3: yamakattherassa anuyogavattajhāpanavasena paṭipucchitvā paṭipucchitvā uttari dhammadesanaṃ pavattesi.
anya-e0903n:844: Taṃ kiṃ maññasi āvuso yamaka, rūpaṃ, vedanaṃ, saññaṃ, saṅkhāre, viññāṇaṃ ‘tathāgato’ti samanupassasi–
anya-e0903n:846: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena khandhavaggasaṃyutte theravagge pañcamaṃ vakkalisuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:847_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante āyasmantaṃ vakkaliṃ theraṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Āyasmā
anya-e0903n:847_1: bhante vakkalithero ābādhiko dukkhito bāḷhagilāno bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “cirapaṭikāhaṃ
anya-e0903n:847_2: bhante bhagavantaṃ dassanāya upasaṅkamitukāmo, natthi ca me kāyasmiṃ tāvatikā balamattā,
anya-e0903n:847_3: yāvatāhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dassanāya upasaṅkameyya”nti. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “alaṃ
anya-e0903n:847_4: vakkali, kiṃ te iminā pūtikāyena diṭṭhena, yo kho vakkali dhammaṃ passati, so maṃ
anya-e0903n:847_5: passati, yo maṃ passati, so dhammaṃ passati. Dhammañhi vakkali passanto maṃ passati,
anya-e0903n:847_6: maṃ passanto dhammaṃ passati. Taṃ kiṃ maññasi vakkali, rūpaṃ niccaṃ vā aniccaṃ vā”ti
anya-e0903n:848: “Ahaṃ vakkali, kiṃ te iminā pūtikāyena diṭṭhena” –
anya-e0903n:849: “Taṃ kiṃ maññasi vakkali, rūpaṃ niccaṃ vā aniccaṃ vā” –
anya-e0903n:851: “Yaṃ panāniccaṃ, dukkhaṃ vā taṃ sukhaṃ vā”–
anya-e0903n:853: Yaṃ panāniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vipariṇāmadhammaṃ, kallaṃ nu taṃ samanupassituṃ “etaṃ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā”–
anya-e0903n:854_0: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso punapi bhagavā bhikkhū pesetvā āyasmato vakkalittherassa paggahavacanaṃ
anya-e0903n:854_1: ārocāpesi. Sopi kathaṃ attano pavattiṃ bhagavato paccārocāpesi. Kathañcassa abhisamparāyo ahosi.
anya-e0903n:855_0: Vissajjanā – suṇāvuso tvaṃ vakkali bhagavato vacanaṃ dvinnañca devatānaṃ, imaṃ āvuso
anya-e0903n:855_1: rattiṃ dve devatāyo abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇā kevalakappaṃ gijjhakūṭaṃ obhāsetvā yena
anya-e0903n:856_0: Bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhaṃsu,
anya-e0903n:856_1: ekamantaṃ ṭhitā kho āvuso ekā devatā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca ‘vakkali bhante bhikkhu
anya-e0903n:856_2: vimokkhāya cetetī’ti. Aparā devatā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca ‘so hi nūna bhante suvimutto
anya-e0903n:856_3: vimuccissatī’ti. Bhagavā ca taṃ āvuso vakkali evamāha ‘mā bhāyi vakkali, mā bhāyi
anya-e0903n:856_4: vakkali, apāpakaṃ te maraṇaṃ bhavissati, apāpikā kālakiriyā’ti. Evaṃ kho bhante bhagavā
anya-e0903n:856_5: punapi bhikkhū pesetvā āyasmato vakkalittherassa paggahavacanaṃ ārocāpesi. Sopi bhante
anya-e0903n:856_6: āyasmā tenahāvuso mama vacanena bhagavato pāde sirasā vandatha “vakkali bhante bhikkhu
anya-e0903n:856_7: ābādhiko dukkhito bāḷhagilāno, so bhagavato pāde sirasā vandatī”ti, evañca vadetha
anya-e0903n:856_8: “rūpaṃ aniccaṃ, tāhaṃ bhante na kaṅkhāmi, yadaniccaṃ taṃ dukkhanti navicikicchāmi,
anya-e0903n:856_9: yadaniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vipariṇāmadhammaṃ, natthi me tattha chando vā rāgo vā pemaṃvāti
anya-e0903n:856_10: na vicikicchāmī”ti evamādinā bhagavato attano pavattiṃ paccārocāpesi. So hi bhante
anya-e0903n:856_11: āyasmā acirapakkantesu tesu bhikkhūsu satthaṃ āharitvā vedanaṃ vikkhambhetvā mūlakammaṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0903n:856_12: ādāya sampajāno arahattaṃ sacchikatvā kālamakāsi. Evaṃ kho bhante tassa āyasmato
anya-e0903n:858: Pucchā – assajisuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:859_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante āyasmantaṃ assajiṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Āyasmā bhante assaji
anya-e0903n:859_1: ābādhiko dukkhito bāḷhagilāno bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “pubbe khvāhaṃ bhante gelaññe
anya-e0903n:859_2: passambhetvā passambhetvā kāyasaṅkhāre viharāmi, sohaṃ samādhiṃ nappaṭilabhāmi. Tassa
anya-e0903n:859_3: mayhaṃ bhante taṃ samādhiṃ appaṭilabhato evaṃ hoti no cassāhaṃ parihāyāmī”ti. Tasmiṃ
anya-e0903n:859_4: bhante vatthusmiṃ “ye te assaji samaṇabrāhmaṇā samādhisārakā samādhisāmaññā, tesaṃ
anya-e0903n:859_5: taṃ samādhiṃ appaṭilabhataṃ evaṃ hoti ‘no cassu mayaṃ parihāyāmā’ti. Taṃ kiṃ maññasi
anya-e0903n:859_6: assaji, rūpaṃ niccaṃ vā aniccaṃ vā”ti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:861: Pucchā – khemakasuttaṃ panāvuso kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kena kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:862_0: Vissajjanā – kosambiyaṃ bhante sambahule there bhikkhū ārabbha āyasmatā khemakattherena
anya-e0903n:862_1: bhāsitaṃ. Sambahulā bhante therā bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ dāsakaṃ pesetvā catukkhattuṃ
anya-e0903n:862_2: āyasmantaṃ khemakaṃ ābādhikaṃ dukkhitaṃ bāḷhagilānaṃ gelaññakāraṇañca dhammañca pucchiṃsu,
anya-e0903n:862_3: tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “pañcime āvuso upādānakkhandhā vuttā bhagavatā. Seyyathidaṃ,
anya-e0903n:862_5: viññāṇupādānakkhandho, imesu khvāhaṃ āvuso pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu na kiñci attaṃ
anya-e0903n:862_6: vā attaniyaṃ vā samanupassāmī”ti evamādinā bhante āyasmatā khemakattherena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n:863_0: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha āyasmā khemako uttari dhammadesanaṃ pavaḍḍhetvā vitthārena
anya-e0903n:863_1: therānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ desesi. Kīdiso ca nesaṃ dhammadesakadhammappaṭiggāhakānaṃ dhammadesanāya ānisaṃso adhigato.
anya-e0903n:864_0: Vissajjanā – catutthe bhante vāre āyasmā khemako “alaṃ āvuso dāsaka kiṃ imāya sandhāvanikāya,
anya-e0903n:864_1: āharāvuso daṇḍaṃ, ahameva therānaṃ santikaṃ gamissāmī”ti daṇḍamolubbha āyasmā khemako
anya-e0903n:864_2: yena therā bhikkhū tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā therehi bhikkhūhi pucchito “nakhvāhaṃ
